story:
Short Summary

Like we all know, Greece is kind of in a pinch right now. I myself am Greek, and one thing I absolutely love about my country is all the great food we grow and produce. That's why I've decided to help the economy grow, even if just a little, by exporting Greek food and other locally produced products to the rest of the world. It's more to us than just feta cheese and olive oil! 


What We Need & What You Get

Greece's debt is €1.6 billion, and while I doub't we'll ever reach that number (if every euro was one second, 1.6 billion seconds would be almost 51 years!), I know that even 0.1% would make a huge difference for a lot of people.

The ones working on this will be me and my father, and we've decided to start at €100,000. To reach that number you can choose from...

  • Pledge €1 - A big thank you from us! This euro will go to the employed peoples wages.

  • Pledge €3 - Get a postcard signed from the Greek people themselves, saying thank you for your contribution. We will ask people on the street to sign it, and tell them about this campaign. 

  • Pledge €5 - Two packages of Chipita Bake Rolls. Crispy bread rolls with salt/ pizza/ tomato olive&oregano/ tzatziki and other flavours. Flavours will be sent out at random.
  • Pledge €8 - 500 grams of Ion Noisetta chocolate covered hazelnut pralines. 

  • Pledge €10 - One box of one of the finest Greek olive oils.

  • Pledge €10 - High quality Greek honey.

  • Pledge €12 - Greek high quality ground coffee from Papagalos.

  • Pledge €25 - "I love Greece" T-shirt
...and more!


How does it work?

We will speak to our contacts in Greece, and employ them for this crowdfunding. They will handle all printing, shopping and sending out packages, while we make sure everything goes smoothly. Our goal is to give the people of Greece a job with a good wages, to give them a chance to rebuild their lives. The more money we can raise, the more Greeks we can employ!


After the campaign

When this campaign is over, we will use any leftover money to start a greek high quality food export website, so that we can continue to send you some Greek love! We will keep you updated on this one.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't buy a postcard or a box of honey, you could always ask your friends to do it! Please help us spread this as much as possible. Thank you!

One last note - this is very much inspired by Thom Feeney's "Greek Bailout Fund" campaign. We are very thankful for your great work! 

Now, let's help Greece!

story:
Lets Build a Co-Working space in Cameroon!

The Digital Entrepreneur House is an upcoming co-working space located in Yaounde (Cameroon) where startups will get access to essential resources (such as broadband connectivity) to reduce their operational costs during the first years of existence, share knowledge and support each other while planting the  seeds for a strong tech ecosystem in Cameroon. 

The co-working space will feature a social lounge that can be used to host events*. 

Entrepreneurs will also have access to meeting rooms*.

Each startup will have assigned desks allowing to work efficiently*.


(*) Pictures do not reflect the actual space and are solely used for descriptive purposes.

The co-working space will be sustained with memberships fees paid by entrepreneurs, funds raised through the hosting of social events/conferences and philanthropic contributions. 


Where is Cameroon ?

Cameroon is a country located on the Gulf of Guinea, some geography books would refer to it as a West African country while others would say it is located in Central Africa. It is usually called Miniature Africa because of its diverse climate, wildlife and landscape. 

Yaounde is the capital city of Cameroon and is also home to a vibrant culture and economy. Often called the city of the seven hills or Ongola in local dialect, it is the second largest city in the country with an estimated 2.5 millions of people living and working there. 



Who are the founders ?

We (Serge Poueme & Francis Siaka) are two Cameroonian engineers and entrepreneurs who strongly believe that success is a collective journey. As far as I remember, we have always collaborated on new ventures, shared dreams, tips and motivated each other to stay on the course. The idea to create a co-working space results from that desire to contribute to the construction of a strong and collaborative tech community in Cameroon that would be the cornerstone for a major industrial revolution in the country. 



Innovation as a key contributor to growth.

That idea is also fueled by our own desire to reuse the competence and skills acquired abroad as catalysts for jobs creation in Cameroon. Developing our business ideas in Cameroon gave us a clear picture of the issues faced by young technology entrepreneurs on that market. After a couple of brainstorming sessions, we came to the conclusion success rates of startup founders would be improved if they were uniting their forces to tackle  issues together instead of  duplicating efforts individually. Among the major challenges  faced by startups in Cameroon, we chose access to office facilities, availability of fast broadband Internet and reliable source of power supply to run IT equipment as the top issues our initiative would provide an alternative for. Beyond these,furthermore, we want to create global awareness about the technology community in Cameroon and link startups entrepreneurs in Cameroon with others around the globe. Regrouping Cameroonian entrepreneurs within a community will make them visible and create  a solid foundation for the democratization of technology in their market space.     

Entrepreneurship matters. 

Creating spaces and communities where entrepreneurs can mature new products or services can have a major impact on growth and sustainable economic development. With 30% unemployment  rate and 75% underemployment; Cameroon is lucky to sit on top of a 71.3% of population literacy rate with a bilingual and well educated workforce. In that context, startups can make a difference by creating jobs and paving the way to new industries that will also alleviate poverty and underemployment. 



Lets make it happen!

By funding our idea, you will help dozens of startup entrepreneurs getting access to affordable office space and services, grow inside a community that believes into the power of disruptive innovations and generate a major impact on jobs and wealth creation in the country. 



Our Budget

To setup and run the co-working space during the first year, we need to invest into the rental of an office space, acquire furniture and electronic equipment, have enough funds to pay water & electricity bills, and also cover salaries for a community manager (on-site and online) and  a maintenance agent. 

We have break down the needs as below:

Type

Amount (Estimated)

Details

Office Space

4400$

Space located within the city.

Furniture & Electronics

4300$

From desks, to chairs, meeting room tables and projectors among others.

Logistic & miscellaneous expenses

3500$

e.g: subscription fees to utilities such as Internet, moving fees to bring equipment and furniture at the space or unexpected fees

Salaries

5484$

Two direct jobs: one Community Manager and one site Maintenance Agent. 






We need your support

To let you know how grateful we are to people who back and support The Digital team has created the following perks to let you know how much we value your contribution.


1$ - "Global Supporter" - Pledge our initiative and get a Postal Card  from Cameroon signed by the team + your name on the "Wall Of Founders". 
20$ - "Water Maker" - Help us paying water bills and get  a "Digital Entrepreneur House" t-shirt & hat + your name on the "Wall Of Founders". 
100$ - "Hydro Maker" - Help us paying electricity bills and get a  recognition plate signed by the team + your name on the "Wall of Founders".
500$ -"Job Creator"  -  Help us covering one month of salaries expense and get a recognition plate + your name on the "Walls Of Founders" + a Yearly Anniversary Card from the team .
1000$ -"Founding Fathers" - Become a top contributor and get a lifetime honorific membership for the co-working space + your name on the "Wall Of Founders"  + a Yearly Anniversary Card from the team.

We can seed positive change in the entrepreneurship community in Cameroon and contribute to  wealth creation


Each of your contributions will improve the chances of a success for young entrepreneurs in Cameroon. Building our businesses in Cameroon, we  have learned a lot about the environmental dynamics there and are confident we can bring the project to completion. If you can not contribute, spread the word around and feel free to join our team! Engaging in projects like this one is always challenging and we need your support to make the dream comes true! If you are in Cameroon, you can even volunteer with our project team and help us building The Digital Entrepreneur House!

story:
Our vision is to build a substantial energy company through investment and acquisitions. Our goal is to take Gulfstar Corporation public and the plan is to accomplish this within five years.

Founder and president Mark F. Butler has 32 years experience in the securities industry as a stockbroker/financial adviser with no customer complaints or industry violations.

This corporation was established in June of 2007 and has acquired oil and gas interests in various capacities i.e. royalties, overriding royalties with working interests, trusts and equities.

The corporation only invests in revenue flow and no drilling speculation.

When a larger O & G company is raising capital for another drilling project they sell off their remaining interests of older projects that are still producing. Gulfstar Corporation will be an interested buyer for these offering. Purchasing the remaining revenue flow. 

Why Crowd Funding? Because for a small company we are not ready for a public offering, bank financing, private placements or other sophisticated financing techniques nor can we comply with the sever cost of regulatory compliance for these offerings. 

This business model works and can grow this company into a solid substantial enterprise. 



Contact information 888-980-9902 office 860-816-5660 cell email mark@gulfstarcorporation.com

story:
Paws & Play Retail Expansion!

  • Paws & Play is Canada's favorite subscription box! Serving budget savy pet parents a healthy selection of top quality and new to market items for the last two years. Paws & Play was pioneered by a team of two experts within the pet industry with vast experience in agriculture and pet nutrition. Operated by a friendly and reliable team of family and friends, who are all knowledgeable in pet safety and nutrition, the entire team at Paws & Play are very passionate about quality pet gear, the environment, healthy living and the well being of our loving furry companions.


  • Our campaign goal is to expand Paws & Play into a warehouse style retail location to offer the general public high quality pet supplies at low warehouse prices, with the same exceptional customer service our members already enjoy. With your contributions we will launch a physical storefront and e-commerce warehouse for members and customers to shop for the best pet gear on the market.
  • By contributing to our campaign you will be supporting a new and innovative business, with a goal of providing pet parents with low warehouse prices for premium quality, everyday pet supplies. You will help the founders of Paws & Play realize a very special goal of expanding our company into a shopping outlet for premium, artisan and gourmet pet supply manufacturers to showcase their products and a community space to share the talents of experts within our industry. 

  • By supporting this campaign, you will also be funding a young entrepreneurs dream to make the world a better place where customer service and quality is at the heart of the company!


What We Need & What You Get

  • Paws & Play needs an additional $30,000 in funds to add to the $20,000 we have already invested from personal savings, to complete the renovations and improvements on the building that will be the future home of Paws & Play!
  • Our team would love to offer great perks to our contributors including great customer care with a dash of humor, free memberships and rewards points!
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will still go towards completing the renovations and we will keep trying until we succeed!


The Impact of a Paws & Play Warehouse

  • Paws & Play provides a unique and memorable experience to each and every customer. Our mission is to ensure that each family who walks through our door receives excellence in customer care and leaves with a product that best suits their pets needs. 
  • Our team will ensure that pet food is always available to be donated to shelters in need.
  • Our physical and online stores will offer our well known and loved Paws & Play rewards points program!
  • Employees will receive extensive training in pet nutrition, product knowledge and customer service as well as highly competitive wages.
  • Paws & Play customers will not only have access to low, warehouse prices but also complimentary in-house events such as special guest appearances, classes, and special events. These events will be available for online customers by live streaming.
  • Paws & Play is the most successful pet subscription box in Canada . Our team excels in customer care and we stock only the best pet products on the market. Check out our website for honest customer reviews: www.pawsandplay.ca  
  • Paws & Play is committed to the pet parent community  through raw and uncut product reviews on our blog: www.pawsandplaylab.com


Our Mission

Paws and Play believes in curating pet boxes using fresh organic fruit and vegetables, free range meat products and the freshest human grade ingredients.

We love buying goods from companies that do not conduct or commission cruelty on farm animals and participate in responsible sourcing and environmental sustainability.

We admit to personally and locally hand packing and overseeing the packing of our own boxes. We make them fresh by checking ingredients and best before dates. We use little or no excess packaging, and we do not send your goods to outside or overseas facilities for processing.

We believe that happy people make happy pets, our membership community filling the world with positivity and the right to make honest mistakes.

We love long walks in the park with our best friend, sharing ice cream, hiking tough trails, and making our moms proud.

We have faith that our boxes are a great value, that our company should make a fair profit and that the customer is always right.


Testimonials

Michael said “Paws & Play is the best thing that I have ever seen for pets. My dog has liked every treat and toy that I have received. She can’t wait till the moment I get home, as she looks forward to her daily treat and play time with the toys. Paws and Pets has added a new level of relationship between myself and my friend Anna. Cud dos guys!”


Sharon said "I want to thank you for what you sent in my last package. In it was a bag of litter mix that when mixed with regular litter and a kitty went to bathroom and it changed color. It helped me to find out that one of my babies needed to see the vet. I was able to catch her urine infection before it caused her great pain. Keep up the great work, folks. I tell every one about your site and hope they listen!"


Karen said "Nothing can describe the feeling I get when I put the paws and play box on the floor every month. The dogs run up to it, sniff the box and wait inpaitiently for me to uncover the goodies! What a wonderful change for our normal routine of work, dinner, walk and bed...once a month the thrill of their Paws & Play box is something we all look forward to!!"



Risks & Challenges

  • Paws & Play is not an ordinary big box franchise, with unlimited resources. We are a family run small business with a big heart. Our biggest challenges have always been finding large amounts of capital and funding without bending to the desires of finance based investors. Paws & Play holds family values very close to our hearts, and refuses to make profits before pets. To our advantage, the community around us has always been extremely supportive of our goals and generous with their resources, skills and valuable time - many folks have invested all of these things in us, helping us grow to be the awesome company we are today!
  • Paws & Play has seen steady growth since opening our company over two years ago. Our team is looking forward to the challenges that are on the horizon, with the help of our generous supporters we can face these challenges head and paws on! 


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Any help is help. Lets's get the word out and make some noise about our campaign- bark at your friends and meow at your family to get this party started!
  • Paws & Play invites you to use the Indiegogo share tools to help achieve our goals!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Alicia Beck and I'm a personal trainer. I can't tell you how excited I am to say those words. For me, fitness is more than daily exercise. It's a way to engage and create potential. A way to build your strengths while inspiring you to move your life forward. And a way for all of us to share a common experience that translates into our daily lives.

At B Fit Personal Training I'll build physical fitness and wellness with a person centered approach. Together with you, I'll create a Hive of fitness. And through individual training, small group fitness, and special fitness programming B Fit will promote confidence, strength, and capability. Our reach will extend to women who are fleeing domestic violence, by providing free classes to women staying at local shelters. Together, we'll give these community members and their children the opportunity to discover their own strengths and move to a new life.


What B Fit Needs & What You Get

With a total of $5,000 in contributions, I'll purchase equipment, pay for facilities, and offer free classes while I build my clientele.

Depending on your level of contribution, you'll get some pretty cool swag; extremely discounted personal or group training for a few weeks or a lifetime; and/or VIP kick-off party admittance. Check out the list of perks and the corresponding levels of contributions.

Other Ways You Can Help

I've set up low cost ways for you to contribute, but sometimes even a few dollars is just too much. Can't contribute financially? Please help me spread the word by using the Indiegogo sharing tools to let others know about my campaign.
story_txt:
Short SummaryI'm Alicia Beck and I'm a personal trainer. I can't tell you how excited I am to say those words. For me, fitness is more than daily exercise. It's a way to engage and create potential. A way to build your strengths while inspiring you to move your life forward. And a way for all of us to share a common experience that translates into our daily lives. At B Fit Personal Training I'll build physical fitness and wellness with a person centered approach. Together with you, I'll create a Hive of fitness. And through
 individual training, small group fitness, and special fitness 
programming B Fit will promote confidence, strength, and capability. Our reach will extend to women who are fleeing domestic violence, by providing free classes to women staying at local shelters. Together, we'll give these community members and their children the opportunity to discover their own strengths and move to a new life. 

  What B Fit Needs & What You Get With a total of $5,000 in contributions, I'll purchase equipment, pay for facilities, and offer free classes while I build my clientele. 
Depending on your level of contribution, you'll get some pretty cool swag; extremely discounted personal or group training for a few weeks or a lifetime; and/or VIP kick-off party admittance. Check out the list of perks and the corresponding levels of contributions. 
  Other Ways You Can Help
I've set up low cost ways for you to contribute, but sometimes even a few dollars is just too much. Can't contribute financially? Please help me spread the word by using the Indiegogo sharing tools to let others know about my campaign.

story:
What Is Global CommUnity?

Global CommUnity will launch in Fall 2016 as an innovative and progressive travel company focused on assisting families and individuals experience other cultures around the world and get the most out of these journeys . . . ultimately creating global citizens who are accepting and supportive of other cultures. The primary goal is to cultivate compassion, understanding, acceptance and common ground that spans borders and results in a world where No One Is Foreign.

Wear Our Message

A $35 contribution gets you either our NO ONE IS FOREIGN t-shirt or our Global CommUnity logo t-shirt.  Plus you’ll receive a $35 gift certificate you can apply toward any Global CommUnity trip that you reserve at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.

What Is Unique About Global CommUnity?

Global CommUnity Life Travel Mapping

Global CommUnity will provide advising services and interactive digital Life Travel Map tools that will help individuals and families with young children to smartly plan and map out key journeys over many years.  Clients can choose between no-cost online resources to map and plan trips themselves or engaging a trained advisor who will interview the family and develop a multi-year detailed plan of key trips planned for specific years and dates based on the ideal time to visit destinations and the recommended ages of children visiting the destinations.

In the interview process, the family members will identify their most important cultures, destinations and interests, enabling the team at Global CommUnity to prioritize and schedule recommended trips.

Cheers!  Enjoy The GlobalCommunity Corkcicle Tumbler

With a $60 contribution, receive this 24-oz Corkcicle tumbler that features the Global CommUnity logo.  It keeps cold beverages cold for 9 hours maintains hot beverages for 3 hours, and it’ll be a conversation starter to talk about the importance of travel.  You also receive a $60 gift certificate toward any Global CommUnity trip you reserve at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.

Pre-Trip Engagement Materials

Global CommUnity seeks to prepare travelers before the journey, so that they are engaged and knowledgeable about the destination before the trip begins. In a world where attention spans are short and distractions are many, these engagement tools will help parents, children and individuals learn and get excited about these once-in-a-lifetime trips and the cultures they’re about to experience.

For traveling families with children 10 years old or younger, the child will receive a hand-made doll made to look like a typical child living at the destination for the trip, as well as a booklet that tells the story of the child. The doll and the storybook will result in young children better understanding the destination and their peers there. Of course, parents will learn from the doll and story too.

Be A Doll & Get A Doll!

With a $100 contribution, you can pick a Global CommUnity doll and storybook from Italy, India, China, Peru or South Africa.  Plus you receive a $100 gift certificate you can apply to any Global CommUnity trip you reserve at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.


For teenage travelers, Global CommUnity will provide fun social media posting content that will subliminally also teach the teenager things about the destination as they post for their friends and family to discover they will soon be going on a special trip. Sneaky but effective, these social media tools won’t fight for attention against teens’ obsession with social media.

For the whole family, Global CommUnity will provide digital downloads of movies, books, recipes, music and recommended local-community activities that are meant to help bring the family together to take time to learn about the destination before the trip and best prepare their minds and hearts for the amazing experiences that await them.

Global CommUnity Itineraries

For key destinations around the world, Global CommUnity will offer private, packaged trips customized for 1) families with young children, 2) families with teenaged children and 3) adults only, and these will be offered in both five-star and four-star versions. Each journey will be seven days in length with optional add-on extensions.  Each seven-day journey will include at least one key experience of volunteering that will benefit the local people, environment/wildlife, or cultural preservation. Each journey will provide ample opportunities to meet and engage with locals.

Support Us & Deaf Children In Peru

On our Peru itinerary, you’ll have the opportunity to assist a school for the deaf.  Today you can make a $150 contribution, and $50 will go directly to help make a documentary that will create awareness and drive support for deaf children in Peru, who often face really challenging circumstances to get an education and employment.  You’ll also receive a $150 gift certificate you can apply to any Global CommUnity trip you reserve at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.

Global CommUnity Founders

Global CommUnity founders Christie Holmes, Keith Waldon and Bryan Glatt have more than 35 years of experience in the travel business, and all three have incorporated travel as key elements of their childrens’ upbringing.  Keith and Bryan founded an innovative travel agency called Departure Lounge in Austin, Texas, in 2013, and Christie joined their travel advisor team.  Quickly they were disappointed in the packaged travel options for younger families that were focused on raising global citizens.  So many travel providers were focused on baby-sitting or kids club options and not focused on enriching experiences designed for the whole family and customized based on the age of the children.  That frustration led to dreaming of what options would be great, and those dreams led to the concept of Global CommUnity.

Help Us Carry The Load With This Duffle!

With a $280 contribution, enjoy this LLBean large adventure duffle bag featuring the Global CommUnity logo.  You’ll also receive a $280 gift certificate you can apply to any Global CommUnity trip you reserve at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.


Why We Need Your Help

Global CommUnity’s founders have spent the past year interviewing and selecting on-the-ground travel partners (the very best) at more than 25 global destinations and working with them to design very special itineraries.  They’ve also sourced the technology needed to assist with the Life Travel Map service, designed the pre-trip engagement materials (including dolls for more than 25 destinations along with story books that tell a child’s story at the destination), selected the digital download materials, and created and trademarked the Global CommUnity brand. 

We need funding to purchase the needed inventory of materials, design and pay for launch marketing, and assist with first-year operational costs.  If you can assist us by donating to the Indiegogo options, we would be so thankful, and every donation includes a great item PLUS a gift certificate you can redeem when you reserve your first Global CommUnity trip.  For most options, the gift certificate enables you to get the full amount of your donation back. 

If you are not in a position to donate, we’d still love your help spreading the world about Global CommUnity.  We could have sought venture capital funding for Global CommUnity, but that route did not feel right.  This brand and its unique offerings should be built as a community effort by those who share our vision.

What We Ultimately Want To Achieve

We know it sounds ambitious, but we want to change the world . . . for the better.  We are sickened that in 2016 such strong evidence of racism and hatred of other cultures is prominent in our mainstream media, social media and political campaigns.  We strongly believe that the way to change this sad situation is through travel and fostering opportunities for our children and ourselves to experience other cultures, put faces with them and ultimately celebrate differences instead of fearing or hating them.  So we want to make international travel easier and less daunting.  We also want to help people make practical long-term plans to achieve their mission of creating global citizens of themselves and their children.

Let’s Ink Your Support!

Celebrating diversity is made very stylish with this handmade Global CommUnity pen made with 13-hand-turned exotic woods from all over the world. This beautiful conversation piece is yours with a $375 contribution, and you will also receive a $375 gift certificate you can apply to any Global CommUnity trip you reserve at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the word (hopefully while wearing one of our t-shirts).  If you know of schools in your area that prioritize international travel, please send us a note to info@NoOneIsForeign.com, and give us a contact person at the school.  If you know any family or family travel bloggers, please tell them about Global CommUnity and send them to www.NoOneIsForeign.com.  If you know other individuals and families who will appreciate what we are creating, please share our info with them.  If you know anyone who would be interested in being a travel advisor in your community to help sell Global CommUnity trips to individuals, families and through schools, please contact us at info@NoOneIsForeign.com.

Ready To Map Out Your Future Travels?

For a $500 contribution, be among the first this fall to have your interview and custom Global CommUnity Life Travel Map (an interactive digital map) to plan up to 12 years of key trips around the world, based on your input and designed by the travel experts at Global CommUnity.  You will also receive a $250 gift certificate you can apply to any trip reserved at www.NoOneIsForeign.com.

story:
Summary

Want to print your own 3D objects? Want people like you to have access to the best technologies for foot health? Curious about 3D printing? Want to see additive manufacturing (3D printing) help reduce environmental waste? 

As a qualified pedorthist and small business owner, my new clinic Ashfield Orthotics: A Foot Health Clinic, Inc. is already something of a "disruptor" in the area of custom orthotics. Until now pedorthists or podiatrists were typically only responsible for the assessment & design aspects of custom foot orthotics. The actual manufacturing usually takes place in a far off lab in Vancouver or Toronto using wasteful CNC manufacturing, with people waiting weeks to get orthotics.

With my own lab, I can already have your prescribed, custom made orthotics ready in 3 days or less. Now I want to be even more of an innovator, with your help. No other clinic in the Canadian prairies is capable of producing their own 3D-printed custom orthotics. And no other lab is willing to lease time on their 3D equipment for amateur designers like you. 

What We Need & What You Get

To continue innovating, Ashfield Orthotics needs 3 things: an exceptional printer, a high resolution scanner and compatible design software. Then I tell people about it. 

I've done the research. 

The LulzBot TAZ 5 is the machine I have chosen, with open-source architecture, large form factor, heated  bed and dual extruders, with the capacity for exotic as well as industry-standard material choices.

Only one company has the global resources and decades of development in scanning technology and design software. You may have heard of them: Autodesk. They recently bought orthotic technology leader Delcam and have 3D scanners and orthotic-specific software.

With this suite of technologies, I can create truly custom foot orthotics in a way that no one else in the prairie provinces are doing, with more precision, greater material choice and better orthotic treatment.

As my partner in the evolution of my clinic, depending on your level of support, you could receive a number of perks:

  • helping people without insurance coverage get custom orthotics
  • free builds of your designs on the Ashfield Orthotics 3D printer
  • named sponsorship recognition in 3D on the clinic wall
  • accommodation and tickets to the Regina Folk Festival
  • 5-star accommodation with breakfasts & tour for you and a friend  

The Impact

As a qualified, certified pedorthist, former rehabilitation therapist and person with a physical disability, I know how important mobility is. And we all know how technological advances are making so much possible for so many these days. You only need to Google 3D printing and medicine to see the results.

My new clinic is a bit of an oasis where people experiencing everything from balance issues to plantar fasciitis to diabetes to traumatic, deforming injuries can expect the best on their way back to comfortable, steady mobility.

The traditional process most commonly used by my profession is to carve out the medical devices from blocks of various plastics (EVA, polypropylene, etc):

  • produces larger quantities of wasted materials
  • adjustments mean shipping products back an forth
  • added lab fees and shipping costs passed on to patients
  • people wait too long for what they need to keep feet healthy 

With 3D printing and your help, I can continue to innovate and meet the foot and leg healthcare needs of people in a timely fashion with the highest possible level of service. 

From a few dollars to donations big enough for perks... Thank you!

Risks & Challenges

You might be thinking "Why should I contribute? He must have lots of money." Actually, I don't. Far from it, in fact. As a new clinic among long-established competitors, I choose - as part of my business model - to keep prices for patients low... lower than all others. Yet helping people maintain pain-free mobility is my passion and expertise. We live simply, are a one car family, my wife is semi-retired and has no pension as a long-time childcare worker.

Plus, getting a bank loan seems silly when you - as one contributor of many - can literally participate in the (3D) results and create your very own objects.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute money. I understand.

It would still be a great help if you used the social networking tools here and at your disposal to tell people about the 3D (r)evolution at Ashfield Orthotics.

And that's all there is to it.

Any amount is greatly appreciated. It all adds up.

Sincerely,

Rodney Ashfield, BA, Cert. Rehab.
Certified Pedorthic Technician
Certified Pedorthist (Canada)

Ashfield Orthotics: A Foot Health Clinic, Inc.

story:
The Project

Green technology and sustainable practices often advocate for some sort of deprivation or drastic change in living conditions with a hefty price tag. The Tiny House Movement requires a person to live in confined quarters without the luxury of personal space. Organic and regional produce can be two to three times more expensive than options at the average supermarket. Environmentally friendly construction is considerably more expensive and time consuming than conventional methods. For the typical family, these choices are not only illogical, they’re unlivable.

 

We believe there is a better way.

 

The Alveare team is driven by the premise that an environmentally sustainable lifestyle and the luxuries on which we rely (hot water, personal space, high-quality produce, electricity/heating) are not mutually exclusive. With proper guidance, anyone can build a home/facility that is both comfortable and good for the planet.

 

Alveare is designed as an economically and environmentally self-sustaining campus where innovative ideas can be perfected for the wider-reaching community. We plan to build earth-sheltered housing (designed by Brian Campbell) that utilizes passive solar techniques to heat and cool the interior of the building and protect the exterior from the elements. We will also manage a full-scale nursery that encourages edible biodiversity and sustainable agriculture while also providing the community with local produce.

 

Community Impact

The Alveare team wants to create a culture in which the innovations tested on the campus are easily applied to everyday life. To do so, we plan to offer several services:

 

Workshops on the following subjects:

Small-scale sustainable agriculture

Earth-sheltered building design and construction

Edible biodiversity landscaping

Anaerobic digester installation and maintenance

 

Products for sale:

Plant sales from the nursery

Anaerobic digester installation

Online tutorials/videos on small-scale projects to improve your home’s efficiency

E-books including diagrams and instructions for each project

 

We believe that the only way to make an impact in our community is to empower others through our workshops and tutorials to live economically and environmentally sustainable lives. In this way, Alveari will become a learning center, a place to grow as an entrepreneur and lover of green technology.

 

How will the money be used?

Currently, the Alveare Project is still in its conceptual stage. We have been approved for a $200,000 mortgage and have marked potential sites in the Blue Ridge Mountains, Shenandoah Valley, and the Piedmont Region of Virginia. The funds raised through this campaign will allow us to procure the site and initial building materials. The more money we raise, the more time can be devoted to the Alveari Project during the initial months of construction and design. Eventually, Bryan and Mal would like to commit to Alveari as a full-time vocation and service to the community, which will be accomplished far faster with adequate funding.

 

Perk links with pictures:

http://www.alveare.org/indiegogo-rewards/seed-c...

http://www.alveare.org/indiegogo-rewards/planti...

http://www.alveare.org/indiegogo-rewards/t-shirt/

The Alveare team is driven by the premise that an environmentally sustainable lifestyle and the luxuries on which we rely (hot water, personal space, high-quality produce, electricity/heating) are not mutually exclusive. Alveare is designed as an economically and environmentally self-sustaining campus where innovative ideas can be perfected for the wider-reaching community. We plan to build earth-sheltered housing (designed by Brian Campbell) that utilizes passive solar techniques to heat and cool the interior of the building and protect the exterior from the elements. We will also manage a full-scale nursery that encourages edible biodiversity and sustainable agriculture while also providing the community with local produce.
 
Community Impact
The Alveare team wants to create a culture in which the innovations tested on the campus are easily applied to everyday life. To do so, we plan to offer several services:
 
Workshops on the following subjects:
Small-scale sustainable agriculture
Earth-sheltered building design and construction
Edible biodiversity landscaping
Anaerobic digester installation and maintenance
 
Products for sale:
Plant sales from the nursery
Anaerobic digester installation
Online tutorials/videos on small-scale projects to improve your home’s efficiency
E-books including diagrams and instructions for each project
 
We believe that the only way to make an impact in our community is to empower others through our workshops and tutorials to live economically and environmentally sustainable lives. In this way, Alveari will become a learning center, a place to grow as an entrepreneur and lover of green technology.
 
How will the money be used?
Currently, the Alveare Project is still in its conceptual stage. We have been approved for a $200,000 mortgage and have marked potential sites in the Blue Ridge Mountains, Shenandoah Valley, and the Piedmont Region of Virginia. The funds raised through this campaign will allow us to procure the site and initial building materials. The more money we raise, the more time can be devoted to the Alveari Project during the initial months of construction and design. Eventually, Bryan and Mal would like to commit to Alveari as a full-time vocation and service to the community, which will be accomplished far faster with adequate funding.
 
Perk links with pictures:
http://www.alveare.org/indiegogo-rewards/seed-c...
http://www.alveare.org/indiegogo-rewards/planti...
http://www.alveare.org/indiegogo-rewards/t-shirt/

story:
Have you ever imagined travel to one of the most beautiful regions of the world and get lost in the hotel because you do not know how to live those truly unique experiences?

This is why Douro & Marão Tours are important to all the travellers that visit the Douro Valley. We are here to provide access to intimate and authentic wine, food and nature experiences not available anywhere else. 

For the last months, we have been analysing data, polling travellers and speaking with hotel executives. We found that the Douro Valley goers wanted more from their local experience.

Many people are tired of the same old Douro Valley experience and want to learn about and try new places, new flavours, new experiences in nature.

There are more than vineyards in Douro Valley, the travellers have to eat traditional food in little traditional houses, taste wines wines in the company of the winemakers that make the wine you taste, visit the beauty of the Marão Mountains.

With our tours, you will live this region with the same intensity as the locals live and know those sites that are not on the tourist map, those experiences that only the locals know.

Watch our video to see the beauty of the Douro Valley, a World Heritage Site by UNESCO.

You can be a local with our tours! Are you ready to start this unforgettable adventure?


What We Need to Make this Dream a Reality?

We need to find people who like us, fall in love with this fantastic region and realise the importance of authentic experiences for travellers.

Our goal are for $35000 and every Dollar are important to our goal and the success of our new project. Dollar to Dollar, we will be one step closer to give travellers really outstanding experiences in the Douro Valley.

All the money will be used for:

* incorporate the company

* pay all the licences and assurances compulsory by law

* build the website

* build the online booking system

* marketing campaign (online and offline in the hotels of the region)

* buy the van to make the transportation of the travellers

* buy material for the outdoor activities in the Marão Mountains.

Chose the Perks that fit best in you and support the business that will change the tours panorama in the Douro Valley! 

How You Can Help?

1) Make a contribution to our campaign, help this dream come real. $1 can make the difference!

2) You can be our ambassador and share/talk about our project to your friend in the social media (facebook, twitter, etc) 

Thanks for the support you can give to this campaign and to make Douro & Marão Tours a reality

story:
Short Summary

     My name is Suzy Barnes. I live in Berrien County in beautiful, southwest Michigan USA.  My love of animal fiber started at my cottage in County Kerry, Ireland which is surrounded by sheep.  When I talk about "fiber" I am referring to the coat of wool clipped from animals like sheep, alpaca, lamas and used to make clothing, yarn, etc.  Michigan is home to more than 50 fiber raising farms.  Turning the wool into a usable form like yarn, requires skirting, washing, drying, carding, and spinning.  Often the fiber has to be shipped long distances at a high cost.  Wait times between 6 months to a year to get processed fiber back are common.  Many people give up and simply throw it on a campfire or in the trash.   This short fall in available service minimizes profits and wastes a valuable asset.

     Hoof-To-Hanger hand processes some of this fiber turning it into beautiful yarn and spinning fiber, as well as knitted clothing and accessories.  We currently offer small classes on fiber processing, knitting and spinning for anyone who wants to learn.  

     With a very active 4-H and agricultural base surrounding us, we would like to increase our processing capacity and education space to assist and engage future and current fiber enthusiasts.  To achieve this goal, we need to add a new building to our existing building and acquire the cottage milling equipment, which would be built by another Michigan based business.  The new addition would feature large observation windows where anyone interested could watch and learn.

     Opening a cottage fiber mill facility would provide trusted, local processing for farmers, educational facilities, decrease waiting times, create jobs and showcase the versatility of fiber from sheep, lama, alpaca and other animals as a useful and beautiful asset.  

What We Need & What You Get

     In order to provide this wonderful opportunity, we are raising funds to expand our current building.  The addition would measure approximately 1,728 sq ft. with a 4" concrete floor to support the heavy equipment.  Cost $70,000.00

     The milling equipment needed includes: - carding machine - picker - pin drafter - spin/ply - skein winder - cone winder - and core spun machines. Cost $152,680.00  Total anticipated financial need:  $223,000

Our hope is that all those donating $1,000 or more get their fiber processed for a %15 reduction in price during our first operating season!  We also will guarantee that you get your own fleece back!!  Those donating with no fiber to process can request a sample skein of yarn for donations of $20 or more. 

     In the event that the entire goal is not reached, funds received will be put toward individual pieces of equipment to be housed in upgraded areas of our current facility.

The Impact

     This facility will be fully available to view and use as a training ground for others worldwide!  We will be able to offer different levels of assistance to those who need a convenient place to process and learn!!  The cottage fiber mill will bring much needed jobs to our area while providing quality products to the consumer.

     An "open view facility" would also help reconnect people with the roots of where fiber garments like socks, sweaters, scarves, mittens and jackets originate.  Knowledge gives people the power to make choices based on ecologically and economically sound information!!  Isn't it time we bonded again with the land and animals that make life comfortable for us all?

Risks & Challenges

     A few of the challenges to be faced will be the learning curve associated with the new equipment.  We have an agreement with the proposed manufacturer to serve a short internship at the current operating mill with continued training at our site after installation of the new equipment in our own facility. 

     Gaining recognition as a quality, premier cottage mill will require connections inside the industry.  As a resident and fiber participant in our area, our reputation for standing behind our word in our current shop is already established.  We hope to offer a "sample run" for each new customer, upon request, which would give them an opportunity to see the quality and characteristics of their fiber and our processing.   A sample run would be limited to no more than 10 lbs. of processing at a 20% fee reduction!!  

Other Ways You Can Help

     For those who cannot make a financial contribution, we ask that you support our effort by telling others about our goal.  If you know anyone with fiber animals, let them in on our plan and help us come out of the gate at full capacity!!  Share our information on Facebook and take advantage of the Indiegogo share tools!!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Jason Kersey, Executive Chef of Like Sunday Morning Food Truck. It has always been my dream to open a restaurant, by recently to start up a chain of food trucks that not only serve great food, but give back to the youth and community as well. During my twenty year culinary journey I have met so many great people along the way, learned new recipes and cooking techniques, and have been able to share my passion for cooking unique and great dishes for the masses. Sunday morning, to me, is synonymous with leisure and enjoying brunch on the deck with my loved ones. We want you to experience this feeling, everyday! Like Sunday Morning will serve as a vessel for youth who are interested in culinary arts and food truck ownership, a chance to intern, learn about the restaurant and food truck industry, and the ability to earn scholarships to further their culinary education. We will source local products from farms and bakeries to include daily in our dishes as a way to give back the community. 

By year three we plan to purchase another truck that is solely operated by our culinary students from local high schools and colleges in Columbia, South Carolina. Upon completion of culinary studies, previous interns have the opportunity to lease or purchase a Like Sunday Morning food truck. 


What We Need & What You Get

We have pooled our personal finances together to purchase our 1986 Ford Econoline E350 RV that is being converted into an insured customized food truck, so we are asking for a $5,000 contribution from you.  We are in need of funds to purchase three months inventory to launch, a customized wrap for the food truck, licensing and permits for North and South Carolina, and three months rent at our commissary kitchen. 

Our perks were designed with you in mind! From a personal shout out via our social media accounts, Like Sunday Morning tees, a gift basket complete with some of my favorite things to use in the kitchen and recipes,  to a personal catering of up to thirty people; we've got you covered. Any donation is greatly appreciated! 

If our goal of $5,000 is exceeded, additional funds will go towards the purchase and installation of solar panels for the truck, to decrease the amount of emissions emitted by the generators. 

The Impact

I believe being out on a food truck will allow me the opportunity to bring southern day-part fusion dishes to people in various states. We would love to pack up the RV and travel to festivals and sporting events being held around the United States and meet new people and allow the different cultures to inspire new dishes for Like Sunday Morning. In Columbia, South Carolina Like Sunday Morning would be one of the only brunch food trucks serving classic dishes such as shrimp and grits, chicken and waffles, chicken wings, fork and knife sandwiches, salads, stuffed burgers, and more any time of day. 

Risks & Challenges

Starting your own business can present various risks and challenges, but my team and I are excited to get started and face whatever adversity we're presented with. From picking the ideal locations to serve our food and grow our brand, to mechanical issues with our RV, and weather contingency plans. Although you can never be too prepared, we have assembled a team from various backgrounds that will put their heads together to resolve said issues. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone may not be able to contribute as you'd hope, but there's still a way to help!

-Please share this campaign on your social media accounts.

-Tell a friend to tell two more friends about us!

Thank you for your support and we look forward to serving you soon!

story:
We are offering all the required tools to exploit bookmakers "money back refund" offers on sports accumulators. It is well known that these are profitable when approached correctly, however existing tools to guide users to do so are typically overpriced, and mask the protocol behind online interfaces so you are still unable to use the technique after your subscription ends. What we are offering is a much fairer alternative: a one off fee for a 100% unlocked tool that allows you not only to make money but see exactly how this is achieved. 


If you are not familiar with matched betting then this project is likely not suitable for you - while the procedure is simple is to follow once you have the required tools we advise you gain experience with more rudimentary matched betting before looking to the accumulator offers for continual guaranteed profit all year round. 


We have been using this tool for months, constantly making guaranteed profit from every single accumulator: unlike speculative methods where profit is dependant on the results.


The tool is already fully functional - given sufficient interest we shall spend the coming week improving the user experience and adding additional features. Ultimately the product shall be capable of: producing lay stakes for 2,3,4,5+6 leg accumulators to give fixed guaranteed profit, for any user input of stake, back/lay odds, free bet extraction %, and exchange commission. Additionally a tool to compute sequential lay stakes for enhanced price accumulators shall also be included. Depending on your requirements either .xls files and/or google sheets shall be provided.

For the price this is being offered you will almost certainly recoup your investment after 3 full accumulators, and all profits for years to come from this technique will go straight into your pocket!

story:
Welcome To OpenLoop!

OpenLoop is a diverse team of students hailing from six universities currently competing in the SpaceX Hyperloop Design Competition. From an initial field of more than one thousand teams, OpenLoop is one of the thirty one teams to make it to the finals. In order to compete in the final round we must build the Hyperloop pod we have designed over the past several months. The Hyperloop will fundamentally change our perception of distance by making travel much faster, cheaper, and more efficient. 


The Mission 

First and foremost our mission is to advance Hyperloop technology to help ensure that the concept becomes a reality as soon as possible. Hyperloop has the potential to fundamentally change how we think about time and distance. Reaching speeds in excess of 700mph, the Hyperloop would enable passengers to commute from San Francisco to LA in as little as thirty minutes, enabling people significantly greater freedom in terms of where and how they live their lives. It is this vision of the future that motivates us to give our all for this project beyond simply winning an engineering competition. Of course, we wouldn't mind snagging first place while we're at it!


The Competition 

The SpaceX Hyperloop Design Competition has its origins with a white paper published by Elon Musk in 2013. In the paper, Elon outlined the Hyperloop concept, a futuristic fifth mode of transportation capable of transporting people great distances in a fraction of the time. In addition to being hyper fast, the system would rely entirely on solar energy making it completely self sustaining. To Elon's surprise, the concept generated a great deal of interest in the engineering community. Several startups were founded to make the concept come to life and in 2015 the competition was announced by SpaceX. The competition was designed to see just how far students could push the Hyperloop concept with nothing but their own determination.


The Build

This campaign focuses on team members from Northeastern University specifically, but all funds will go towards our teams competition expenses as a whole. At Northeastern, we are responsible for building our pod's suspension system which includes the air skates, frame, and brakes. However, building the suspension will prove a much bigger challenge than simply assembling the air skates, frame, and brakes. The real challenge will be making sure all of those parts work together and ensuring that the systems developed by other schools are integrated successfully. Updates on our progress will be posted to this campaign weekly so everyone involved can get a better idea of what we are doing and watch this project come to life!!


Join Us!

Team Website - opnlp.co
Hyperloop Alpha Paper
http://www.spacex.com/sites/spacex/files/hyperloop_alpha-20130812.pdf

story:
En Français: Appel à l'action:   C'est 1er 100% Eco et business friendly humanitaire dans le monde. Appel à l'action pour tous les humains pour soutenir l'environnement, les petites entreprises, les humains et la solidarité de la communauté dans les petites villes et villages dans le monde. J'ai rejeté venture capitaliste et des anges, parce que je crois dans de nombreux types volonté d'améliorer notre monde, donc soutenir ma campagne de crowdfunding réduire votre impact, soutenir les petites entreprises et aider à créer de solides micro communautés et soutenir ceux qui en ont besoin dans le monde entier.

In English: Call to Action: This is 1st 100% Eco and humanitarian friendly business in the world. Call to action for all humans to support the environment, small businesses, humans and community solidarity in small cities and towns globally. I have rejected venture capitalist and angels, because I believe in man kinds willingness to improve our world, so support my crowdfunding campaign lower your impact, support small business and help create strong micro communities and support those in need around the world. 


En Français: Le projet: Le projet a 4 objectifs un à soutenir l'économie locale comme une plate-forme en ligne et physiquement sous la forme d'un lieu café / marché qui permet la vente de produits fabriqués et produits localement entre les petites entreprises, maman-et- pops, des agriculteurs, des artistes et des organismes de bienfaisance directement à la communauté locale assurant la simulation économique et la solidarité de la communauté. Deuxièmement, pour réduire l'impact environnemental de l'homme sur le monde, le modèle 100% respectueux de l'environnement, les pratiques de solidarité affaires amical et végétariens humanitaires pour soutenir, le modèle et encourager les autres propriétaires d'entreprises et le grand public à agir écologiquement et socialement responsable tout en aidant les personnes dans avoir besoin. Troisièmement, pour apporter la même qualité, le service et les produits de la grande ville pour les petites villes. Enfin, pour créer des collectivités solides et l'aide humanitaire, en développant et entretenir des micro-communautés du monde entier à travers la conscience de la communauté et de la compassion.

In English: The Project: The project has 4 targets one to support the local economy as a platform online and physically in the form of a cafe/market place that enables the sale of locally made and produced goods between small business, mom-and-pops, farmers, artists and charities directly to the local community insuring economic simulation and community solidarity. Second, to lower the human environmental impact on the world, model 100% environmentally friendly, humanitarian friendly, solidarity friendly and vegetarian business practices to support, model and encourage other business owners and the general public to act environmentally and socially responsible while helping those in need. Third, to bring the same high standard, service and products of the big city to smaller cities and towns. Finally, to create strong communities and humanitarian support by developing and nurturing micro-communities around the world through community consciousness and compassion.




En Français: Pourquoi soutenir Le Projet: Votre permettra de développer de solides communautés micro dans le monde entier, par éco-il organiquement augmenter les opérations écologiques d'autres affaires entourant l'exploitation, en soutenant les organismes de bienfaisance, il touchera un corps plus grand de personnes dans le besoin et par apporter des produits de petites entreprises pour les consommateurs, il contribuera à la longévité des start-ups, maman-et-pop, les agriculteurs locaux. Donc, me soutenir dans le soutien de notre terre et les humains à travers le monde que j'ouvre le premier 100% écologique et convivial humanitaire et entreprise exploitée dans les petites villes et villages à travers le monde. # 1 Grenoble, France en 2017!

In English: Why support the Project: Your will help develop strong micro communities around the world, by operating eco-friendly it will organically increase the eco operations of other surrounding business, by supporting charities it will touch a larger body of people  in need and by bring small business products to consumers it will help the longevity of start-ups, mom-and-pops, local farmers.  So support me in supporting our earth and humans around the world as I open the first 100% eco and humanitarian friendly and operated business in small cities and towns around the world. #1 Grenoble, France in 2017!


En Français: Pourquoi vert Canteen et notre plus grand risque: Comme cela est la première 100% écologique et exploités par la compagnie amicale humanitaire et nous espérons que dans le monde -hopefully un jour le premier à chaîne mondiale le plus grand défi auquel nous sommes confrontés est de maintenir nos valeurs fondamentales de fonctionnement 100% sans déchets, humanitaire ciblée, végétarien et respectueux de l'environnement. Beaucoup d'affaires se prétendre être respectueux de l'environnement, mais si vous regardez vraiment toutes les pratiques de fonctionnement, vous trouverez moins respectueux de l'environnement dit et raccourcis. Par exemple, nous allons perdre aucune nourriture, utiliser uniquement éco ou dégradables produits écologiques et donner à tous les aliments non consommés à ceux dans le besoin. Lorsque vous faites fonctionner dans un projet social, vous avez tenu à un niveau beaucoup plus élevé qu'une entreprise régulière, donc nous aurons pas de place pour des erreurs dans nos opérations et de la culture que le moindre incident pourrait mettre notre marque en jeu. Pour atténuer cela, nous allons employer et en partenariat avec des groupes et des individus qui ont les mêmes croyances et surveillent quotidiennement nos opérations. Ainsi, le soutien vert Cantine Aujourd'hui et soutenir votre monde, l'humanité et la construction des communautés.

In English: Why Green Canteen and Our Biggest Risk: As this is the first 100% eco and humanitarian friendly operated company and hopefully in the world -hopefully one day the first global chain- the biggest challenge we face is maintain our core values of operating 100% waste free, humanitarian focused, vegetarian and eco friendly. Many business will claim to be eco-friendly, but if you really look at all the operation practices, you will find less than eco-friendly says and short cuts. For example, we will waste no food, use only eco or degradable friendly products and give all uneaten food to those in need. When you operate under a social project, you have held to a much higher standard than a regular business, so we will have not room for mistakes in our operations and culture as the slightest incident could put our brand at stake. To mitigate this we will employ and partner with groups and individuals that have the same beliefs and monitor our operations daily.  So, support Green Canteen Today and support your world, humanity and building communities.

En Français: Qui suis-je: Je suis un humanitaire toute ma vie. Je dois fournir un abri, de la nourriture, des vêtements, de l'argent, l'amitié, l'emploi, l'éducation et 1000s mentorat. Aujourd'hui, je suis végétarien, la vie 100% écologique, 100% convivial humanitaire et l'activité contribuent à ma communauté locale autant et aussi souvent que je peux avec mon temps, l'amour et le soutien (financier ou émotionnel). J'ai un MBA, MS HR / Organisation pour le développement, l'éducation et MS ai voyagé dans plus de 100 pays et je sais plus de 300 cultures. Après avoir parcouru le monde et de voir plus de 100 pays et retour à la maison à New York, je me suis senti inspiré pour faire plus et de créer une entreprise verte et humanitaire mondiale qui contribuerait à l'environnement, d'autres bien-pensants, soutenir les petites entreprises et de promouvoir la communauté, même dans le les plus petites villes et villes à travers le monde. Je voulais aussi ajouter de la valeur aux petites villes et villages qui sont souvent regardé et pas donnés le même service, le produit et la valeur de l'expérience que les grandes villes. Enfin, je voulais aider le monde à renouer avec leur sens de l'humanité et ce que cela signifie pour montrer la bonté humaine. Vert Canteen fait cela!

In English: Who am I: I have been a humanitarian my whole life. I have provide shelter, food, clothes, money, friendship, employment, education and mentoring 1000s. Today, I am vegetarian, life 100% eco-friendly, 100% humanitarian friendly and activity contribute to my local community as much and as often as I can with my time, love and support (financial or emotional). I have an MBA, MS HR/ Organization Development, MS Education and have traveled to over 100 countries and know over 300 cultures. After traveling the world and seeing over 100 countries and returning home to New York, I felt inspired to do more and create a global green and humanitarian business that would help the environment, other do-gooders, support small businesses and promote community even in the smallest towns and cities around the world. I wanted also to add value to small cities and towns that are often looked over and not given the same service, product and experience value as big cities. Finally, I wanted to help the world reconnect with their sense of humanity and what it means to show human kindness. Green Canteen does that!


PROJETS PASSÉS DE MINE: VÊTEMENTS ECHANGE POUR LA CHARITE           PAST PROJECTS OF MINE: CLOTHES SWAPPING FOR CHARITY


  
MON DERNIER TOUR DU MONDE: KAZAKHSTAN PAYS 90 & HER TEA!           ME ON MY LAST WORLD TOUR: KAZAKHSTAN COUNTRY 90 & HER TEA! 

Now you know me & my awesome project, so support me in supporting our planet, our community & our humanity by becoming a Green Canteen Founding Donor! 

Maintenant, vous savez moi et mon projet génial, donc me soutenir dans le soutien de notre planète, notre communauté et notre humanité en devenant un donateur vert Canteen fondateur!

Thank you with Hugs &  Merci avec Bisous, 


Harlem Williams 


Perks: 

5: Party Starter.. I Could Hug U!: Thanks for getting the party started... The next awesome thing you can do is share the campaign to help get the word out. Big Hug for starting the party! 

10: Green Canteen Founder+SCREAM!:  I am SCREAMING thank to you! You are now a Green Canteen Founding Donor and a permanently in the Green Canteen Community.  You will receive campaign and project updates via our Facebook page, YouTube Channel and on Indiegogo. Keep Starting Dreams! If you were here, I would hug you!  Here is the link to Green Canteen's FB page like it for updates:

20: Rock Star+Kickstarter+SCREAM!: SCREAMING THANK YOU 2X!  You get your name SCREAMED & a SHOUT-OUT on Green Canteen's Facebook Page. You can check the FB page in the next 24 hours for to see your NAME SCREAMED on Green Canteen's page, because our are such a ROCK STAR deserving to have your name in lights. You can repost it or tag your SCREAM to share with your Friends! Plus you get the 10+ Perks. Thx Rock Star!

30: MVP+TWEET That+SCREAM! STILL SCREAMING 3X! This time you get personalized message and shout-out on FB and Twitter to share or retweet with all your friends. You deserve it for making it RAIN GREEN. Check our new FB page and my twitter page in the next 24 hours for your shout-out. to share it with your friends. Plus all the +10 Perks

40: GoGo Green+YouTube Me+SCREAM! : No more sharing your screams! You get you own YouTube Thank you video. In your personal video I say name, thank you & giving you a big screaming Thank You. The best thing is you can save the video as a personal memory or share it with anyone using the YouTube link. Check our FB page in the next 24 hours for your video.

50:In the Fam+Taste It 2x+SCREAM!:You are now a life time Green Canteen (GC) Green Card Member. You will receive your e-Green card via email. You can use it to collect and earn points at GC Online or In-Store. You also get 2 free coffees or teas at the GC or you can pick one of the free Green Card goodies at the online store, Finally, you get that hug we owed you when you visit our store. Plus the 10+perks. 

75: Taste It 5x+SCREAM: You get 5 free coffees or teas in-store or 2 free Green Card Goodies online once the store is online and running. Plus the 10+ Perks.

100: GO Blue+Taste It 10x+SCREAM!:You have Blue card status for life. You name will be listed on our Indiegogo campaign, the Green Canteen blog and at harlemwilliams.com as big impact contributor. You get 10 Free coffees or teas in-store or 2 free Blue gifts online. You will receive the e-card and perk by email. Plus you get all the 10+ Perks. 

150: LaunchParty+TasteIt5x+SCREAM!: You get a personal invitation to one of our 3 launch parties in either New York, Paris and Grenoble. You can pick the launch party you prefer to attend out of the 3 we are having and we will send you the invite via email. Plus you get all the 5+ perks . 

300: VIP=3Cities=3Parties+SCREAM!: You are invited to all 3 VIP parties (New York, Paris and Grenoble)  and have access to the VIP section and VIP goodies. Plus, all the Taste It 5x+SCREAM Perks. 

500: VIP=3Citys=Partys=10x+SCREAM!: You have VIP access to all 3 launch parties (New York, Paris and Grenoble)  + the VIP section + VIP goodies at the party + lifetime Blue Card Membership + 10 free coffee/ tea and all the other 100+ perks. 

1000: GoPurple+Party+Blog+15xScream! You are a Purple Card member for life + your name plagued on the Hall of Frame store wall & website + a featured article on our blog +invitations to product testing, free samples & market promotions + VIP access to 3 launch parties (New York, Paris, Grenoble) + Taste It 15x + personal YouTube video + Media shout-outs + your name on our Indiegogo campaign + GC goodies + updates.  

2500: GlobalVIP+TripNYCParis+SCREAM!: You are a gold card member for life. You get a free trip to stay with me during launch week in Paris or New York (with promo events+party+stay+flight NYC -Paris or Paris-NYC roundtrip) + a private dinner with me +feature in my video for FrenchWeb.fr + plague on the Wall of Fame+ VIP to the 2 other launches+ Taste it 20x + YouTube Video+ Blog article+ Indiegogo/ FB SCREAM +  updates. 

5000: GlobalVIP+2TripSNYCParis+VP!: You are my Launch VP! You travel with me for 2 weeks & 2 launch parties (NYC+Paris). Your flights+accomodation (staying with me) is free. You get a drink named after you+ plague on  Wall of Fame + Taste it 20x+ a private dinner with me + gold card+ feature in my video for FrenchWeb.fr + VIP access to the other 2 Parties+ YouTube Video+ Blog article+ Indiegogo & FB SCREAM +updates. 

10000: CEO+3Trips+3Parties+365Drinks: My Launch CEO! You travel with me for 2 weeks 3 launches in 3 cities (NYC+Paris+Grenoble). Your flights+accomodation (staying with me) is free. You get 1 free drink a day for 1 yr @GC + a drink named after you+ a private dinner with me +feature in my video for FrenchWeb.fr + plague on the Wall of Fame+ VIP access at Launches + YouTube, Blog & Indiegogo Video + FB SCREAM + updates

J'ai rejeté venture capitaliste et des anges, parce que je crois dans de nombreux types volonté d'améliorer notre monde, donc soutenir ma campagne de crowdfunding réduire votre impact, soutenir les petites entreprises et aider à créer de solides micro communautés et soutenir ceux qui en ont besoin dans le monde entier.In English: Call to Action: This is 1st 100% Eco and humanitarian friendly business in the world. story:
The idea for {POST}MODERN grew (literally) from stinky plastic buckets in our families’ kitchens. About 10 years ago, our hometown of Seattle started curbside collection of food scraps. We loved the idea of composting food waste, but the countertop containers and compostable bag liners were disgusting, wet, stinky additions to our homes. So, we started working on ways to make collecting food scraps easy and clean.

  • Compostable food scrap disposal system keeps food waste out of sight —and out of smell
  • Goes straight into curbside or backyard compost bins
  • Vacuum-like seal keeps moisture and odors isolated
  • Made from 100% recycled corrugated boxes
  • Starter kit includes: 1 under-sink hanger, 3 (1.25 gallon) compostable caddies
  • Refill pack includes: 5 compostable caddies

We need your help to grow {POST}MODERN!

We’re making the transition from producing and selling small quantities to manufacturing and distributing on a larger scale. We've got a big order on the way, and we need your help to fund it and get off to a fast start. We're hoping to offset 1/3 the cost of our first large shipment with pre-orders on Indiegogo (so we can order again even sooner and keep this virtuous food waste compost cycle going!):


Our project timeline


Risks & challenges

We’ve limited project risk by working closely with a leading commercial composting facility to ensure our product is acceptable in curbside composting programs. Made from 100% recycled corrugated boxes, our molded pulp containers break down quickly in compost facilities and contribute to rich compost, healthy soil, and the big-picture goal of keeping food waste out of landfills.

Although we've built hundreds of units in low-volume production, this is our first mass-production run and delivery timing is a risk. We’re working with an experienced manufacturing partner, and we’ve built a conservative timeline to make sure we meet Indiegogo and retailer fulfillment commitments.


Other ways you can help

If you can't contribute financially, please like our share our campaign on Facebook, tell your friends about us, and most importantly do what you can to keep food out of landfills by limiting waste and composting.


Who we are

We're {POST}MODERN: Gabe, Greg and Glenn. Three environmentalists, gardeners and inventors who own a Seattle-based design agency (Platform, Inc.) that’s launched lots of products for big brands. But {POST}MODERN is the first time we’ve taken the chance and created one for ourselves. It's been satisfying to make something that further represents our philosophy: doing the right thing, and always looking for a better, more powerful way to do it. And, it’s been fun to see how much people appreciate it.
story_txt:
The idea for {POST}MODERN grew (literally) from stinky plastic buckets in our families’ kitchens. About 10 years ago, our hometown of Seattle started curbside collection of food scraps. We loved the idea of composting food waste, but
the countertop containers and compostable bag liners were
disgusting, wet, stinky additions to our homes. So, we started working on
ways to make collecting food scraps easy and clean.





Compostable food scrap disposal system keeps food waste out of sight —and out of smell
Goes straight into curbside or backyard compost bins
Vacuum-like seal keeps moisture and odors isolated
Made from 100% recycled corrugated boxes
Starter kit includes: 1 under-sink hanger, 3 (1.25 gallon) compostable caddies
Refill pack includes: 5 compostable caddies



We need your help to grow {POST}MODERN!




We’re making the transition from producing and selling small quantities to manufacturing and distributing on a larger scale. We've got a big order on the way, and we need your help to fund it and get off to a fast start. We're hoping to offset 1/3 the cost of our first large shipment with pre-orders on Indiegogo (so we can order again even sooner and keep this virtuous food waste compost cycle going!):








Our project timeline










Risks & challenges

  

We’ve limited project risk by working closely with a leading commercial composting facility to ensure our product is acceptable in curbside composting programs. Made from 100% recycled corrugated boxes, our molded pulp containers break down quickly in compost facilities and contribute to rich compost, healthy soil, and the big-picture goal of keeping food waste out of landfills.
Although we've built hundreds of units in low-volume production, this is our first mass-production run and delivery timing is
a risk. We’re working with an experienced manufacturing partner, and we’ve
built a conservative timeline to make sure we meet Indiegogo and retailer fulfillment commitments.   
Other ways you can help If you can't contribute financially, please like our share our campaign on Facebook, tell your friends about us, and most importantly do what you can to keep food out of landfills by limiting waste and composting.
