story:
A New Performing Arts Space and Cafe in Palestine

“Sometimes home is full of new possibilities, you just have to look or change how you look.” Jacques Lecoq


Who am I?

My name is Mo’min Swaitat and I am a young Palestinian performer and performing arts teacher. My work aims to address some of the hardships of life under occupation by encouraging creative and artistic expression amongst young people and engaging young artist to provide for them platform for advanced practitioners in the arts interested in further to the unknown to look at it from different ways. 

Having recently graduated from the London International School for Performing Arts (LISPA) where I trained in the Lecoq method, I am currently teaching at Al-Kasaba Academy in Ramallah. I am now planning to introduce Lecoq to Palestine for the first time.

I aim to open a cutting-edge performing arts and cultural space within Al-Kasaba Theatre, which will function for workshops, rehearsals, public performances and as a cafe/workspace for young creatives and the local community in Ramallah.

The space won't just be used for performers, but will be open to anyone who wants to hold new kinds of cultural events or is looking for a creative hub where they can meet likeminded people and brainstorm new ideas. This is something we artists desperately need in Palestine. 


Why Lecoq?

Why Lecoq?Jacques Lecoq was a leading French mime and performing arts instructor who believed that teaching techniques of body movement, clowning, mime, puppetry and mask work could facilitate physical and emotional release.

By emphasising mask training and other forms of expression over the spoken word, Jacques Lecoq wished to create a less elitist type of theatre which would give a voice to the marginalised and disempowered of the world. This is something that I found very inspiring throughout my training at LISPA, where I discovered how physical theatre could be used as a powerful tool for communicating social and political issues affecting the Palestinian community.

The main aim of teaching Lecoq is to provide a safe and supportive environment in which young people can express their thoughts, feelings and emotions about life under occupation, whilst also liberating them from their day-to-day realities by exploring new ways of thinking and being in Palestine.


Why is this important?

Having lived and worked in Jenin refugee camp for much of my life, I have observed firsthand the devastating consequences of military occupation on different Palestinian communities in the West Bank. In addition to unemployment and restrictions on their travel, routine exposure to violence and imprisonment has resulted in soaring levels of post-traumatic stress and widespread feelings of frustration and hopelessness.

As a young Palestinian actor and director, I have seen how therapeutic and empowering theatre can be for both performers and audiences in Palestine. I believe strongly that theatre has great potential to educate both performers and audiences about the many artistic non-violent forms that the Palestinian struggle can take. But I am concerned about moving away from many of the stereotypical representations of Palestinians in theatre. I believe that Lecoq training will provide students with the necessary freedom and distance to explore the issues affecting them today whilst not relying on conventional modes of storytelling which can limit imagination and creative expression.

Sadly, there are currently no programmes offered in the West Bank which focus on physical theatre. I want to support a process in which Palestinian theatre can become engaged in more experimental work. I hope that introducing the Lecoq Method to Al-Kasaba will equip emerging Palestinian artists with the skills required to perform professionally and compete on an international stage, providing hope and inspiration, as well as new opportunities, for performers living under occupation.


What will the space include?

The new space will feature brand-new equipment and props : lighting, sound equipment, projectors, a full set of Lecoq masks amongst others.

When not being used for workshops weekly performances and rehearsals, the space will also be open as a cafe with wi-fi for young creatives and others to come and work, brainstorm ideas and unwind. It can be used to host comedy nights, open mic sessions, musical performances and poetry readings amongst others. I'll also open it up to local organisations, initiatives and co-operatives who need a working space. 

The first workshop will open to both professional performers and people who have no previous training on 7th March 2016 and run until the 14th May 2016. Participants will explore different kinds of mask training (expressive, neutral, larval etc.) whilst devising their own pieces and learning to interact with objects and their environment in radical new ways.

This mask training will be a pilot scheme which will then be used to develop a physical theatre programme for the coming years.


How can you help?

It has never been more important to support the arts in Palestine, which is a desperately under-funded sector. This project will be the first of its kind in the West Bank. Now I need your help to ensure that together we can make it a reality. ..


I need to raise $25,000

Income received will go towards the costs of :

  • Renovating the space 
  • Purchasing state of the art new equipment and props
  • The running costs of three-month workshops in the spring, and intensive short courses over the summer.

  • Sponsoring students who are unable to take part in workshops.

This new year, give young people in Palestine the chance to explore a whole new world of possibilities, to dream big and build a bright new future.

Purchasing state of the art new equipment and props

story:
Olde Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka

It's not just a Drink it's an Experience

Our premium Hemp Infused Gluten Free Vodka is distilled 3 times, and filtered. We source the finest ingredients. The result is a medium bodied Vodka that produces a slightly nutty flavor on the front, and an Ultra Smooth Vanilla Finish. Served best chilled or over ice.

                                                                         Front Bottle Label

Olde Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka contains no THC. THC is the psychoactive ingredient found in Marijuana.

Our product will stand out from its competition as our beautifully package Vodka will have a smokey appearance . This smokey appearance is the result of the maceration process. Some have said it looks as though someone has blown smoke into the bottle. 


                                                                        Back Label

Gluten Free for those 3 million people in the USA  who suffer from Celiac disease a autoimmune disorder that can occur in genetically predisposed people where the ingestion of gluten leads to damage in the small intestine. And for the 18 Million more who are Gluten Sensitive.


Hemp seeds contain omega-6 and omega - 3 fatty acids, proteins, vitamins A, E and D, and many B vitamins. They are also rich in sodium,calcium and dietary fiber and iron. Our process of macerating hemp seeds in grain alcohol, extracts oils from the seeds. This process does capture a percentage of the omega's , minerals, and vitamins.  Please note, Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka, is not a heath drink nor should it be consider as part of a healthy diet or life style. As with any alcohol, please drink it in moderation and do not drink and operate a motor vehicle or heavy equipment.

                                                                              


Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka is owned by Now Brands, LLC. The company has pledge 10% of its net profits to fight childhood cancer. The company will  make its donation at the end of its fiscal year to the The International Pleuropulmonary Blastoma.  http://www.ppbregistry.org/

                                                                         


                 Now Brands, LLC is lead by its managing director Cleve Tsai.

Mr.Tsai holds a bachelor’s degree from the University of Albany, New York. He has over ten years of managerial experience working in various fields of endeavor to include the Automobile Industry, Consumer Products and Sales / Marketing.

He is a serial entrepreneur having owned several successful small businesses. In this venture he is joined by a  consultant who posses 25 years of beverage alcohol industry experience, and  who just so happens to be his father in-law.

Together, they have finalized the proprietary process used to produce Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka.

                                            Distribution

A New York based beverage alcohol distributor has been appointed, and is in place to launch the brand. Expected product launch is spring of 2016. Our NY distributor is owned and operated by a 25 year industry veteran who has many past successes in building brands in the Metro New York Market.

The distributor employees a talented sales force who understand that a sale to a retailer is not a true sale, but that a true sale is achieved when a customer makes a purchase of a product they represent. And to achieve a true sale, a product is not just sold to a retailer, the product is placed. Meaning that products must be placed in key positions on a shelf, counter or in a floor display, to provide the fullest exposure possible to customers. 

It is because of this philosophy that we choose Forum Brands to be our NY distributor and to manage our product launch.

                                             Distillery

     

                        

Our product is produced by master distiller Dustin Skartved, in Riviera Beach Florida. We choose Dustin because he is a true artisan that takes pride in his work and is very easy to work with.  His philosophy towards distillation is to use quality products and processes in every step of the process, beginning with fermentation and ending in a quality finished product. The proof of his dedication is in the bottle!

 

Why do we need to run a crowd funding campaign

Now Brands, is seeking to raise additional capital so that we may reach economies of scales in production, that will better enable us to market, advertise and expand distribution past our initial target market of Metro New York. 

Olde Imperial Mystic Vodka, is presently scheduled to launch the product in the 2nd quarter of 2016.

What we are seeking

Now Brands LLC is seeking to raise $48,000 US

We will us the funds as follows:
  • Increase production -                                     $26,000.00
  • Purchase Point of Sale Displays -              $  8,000.00
  • Banner Ads -                                                      $   2,000.00
  • Promotions / Advertising -                           $ 10,000.00
  • Enter Award Contests-                                   $   2,000.00

       

      

                                  

 Perks

To show our appreciation for your contribution to our campaign, we have some great Perks to send your way.  

   


            
Perks for our Silver - Gold and Platinum Contributors we have additional special perks for you to Include Personalized labeled Bottles of Old Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka. See perks section for more details
For $1000.00 contribution you are invited to attend our Product Launch Party in Metro New York.  Where you will enjoy  Good Food, Adult Beverages, and meet very interesting people!

                                                                                         

Risks & Challenges

No business venture is without risk. We understand the market we are entering is tightly regulated, and is very competitive. Consumers may view our product as just novelty brand. 

Now Brands is confident that we will not only win over consumers with the quality of our Premium Product, but that we will also gain a competitive advantage of our competitors.

                                                                             


                                                  So how do we win over consumers?

It starts with basic consumer merchandising practices of:

Package, Price and Position

Package - Ole Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka, is package in a high shoulder pump clear glass bottle. Our full color front label ( shown above) will produced on glossy vinyl which will enhance the vibrant colors and have the package jump out at consumers, and off the shelves!

Price - Our premium Vodka with a super premium taste and package will be priced at an affordable price for such a superior Vodka. MSRP is $29.99 750ML

Position - We will achieve product placement and position based on pint of sale, promotions and packaging.

We gain our competitive advantage not only through price, but with the quality of our product. Our product is Hand Crafted and Gluten free. Again, we are confident that the proof is in the pudding, in this case in the Vodka itself.  By submitting the product to  various beverage alcohol tasting competitions, we expect to win several awards.

Olde Imperial Mystic is not the only hemp infused alcoholic beverage on the market, But it will be the BEST.

                                                                               

                                 

    If you can't contribute

    We know not everyone can contribute, but you can still help us succeed by getting the word out about our campaign and product.

    •  We remind you to use the Indiegogo share tools!
    • Call for Olde Imperial MYSTIC ( or just MYSTIC Vodka for short) Hemp Infused Vodka at your favorite watering hole, eatery or club.
    • Ask for it at your package store
    • Visit our website and social media pages

     Disclaimer - You must be 21 or older in order to receive 750 ML bottle or bottles of Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka. Proof of age will be required at time of delivery.
story_txt:
Olde Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka
It's not just a Drink it's an Experience

Our premium Hemp Infused Gluten Free Vodka is distilled 3 times, and filtered. We source the finest ingredients. The result is a medium bodied Vodka that produces a slightly nutty flavor on the front, and an Ultra Smooth Vanilla Finish. Served best chilled or over ice.



                                                                         Front Bottle Label
Olde Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka contains no THC. THC is the psychoactive ingredient found in Marijuana. 
Our product will stand out from its competition as our beautifully package Vodka will have a smokey appearance . This smokey appearance is the result of the maceration process. Some have said it looks as though someone has blown smoke into the bottle.  


                                                                        Back Label
Gluten Free for those 3 million people in the USA  who suffer from Celiac disease a autoimmune disorder that can occur in genetically predisposed people where the ingestion of gluten leads to damage in the small intestine. And for the 18 Million more who are Gluten Sensitive.



Hemp seeds contain omega-6 and omega - 3 fatty acids, proteins, vitamins A, E and D, and many B vitamins. They are also rich in sodium,calcium and dietary fiber and iron. Our process of macerating hemp seeds in grain alcohol, extracts oils from the seeds. This process does capture a percentage of the omega's , minerals, and vitamins.  Please note, Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka, is not a heath drink nor should it be consider as part of a healthy diet or life style. As with any alcohol, please drink it in moderation and do not drink and operate a motor vehicle or heavy equipment.
                                                                              



Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka is owned by Now Brands, LLC. The company has pledge 10% of its net profits to fight childhood cancer. The company will  make its donation at the end of its fiscal year to the The International Pleuropulmonary Blastoma.  http://www.ppbregistry.org/
                                                                         


                 Now Brands, LLC is lead by its managing director Cleve Tsai.
Mr.Tsai holds a bachelor’s degree from the University of Albany, New York. He has over ten years of managerial experience working in various fields of endeavor to include the Automobile Industry, Consumer Products and Sales / Marketing.
He is a serial entrepreneur having owned several successful small businesses. In this venture he is joined by a  consultant who posses 25 years of beverage alcohol industry experience, and  who just so happens to be his father in-law. 
Together, they have finalized the proprietary process used to produce Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka.


                                            Distribution
A New York based beverage alcohol distributor has been appointed, and is in place to launch the brand. Expected product launch is spring of 2016. Our NY distributor is owned and operated by a 25 year industry veteran who has many past successes in building brands in the Metro New York Market.

The distributor employees a talented sales force who understand that a sale to a retailer is not a true sale, but that a true sale is achieved when a customer makes a purchase of a product they represent. And to achieve a true sale, a product is not just sold to a retailer, the product is placed. Meaning that products must be placed in key positions on a shelf, counter or in a floor display, to provide the fullest exposure possible to customers. 
It is because of this philosophy that we choose Forum Brands to be our NY distributor and to manage our product launch.
                                             Distillery
                              
Our product is produced by master distiller Dustin Skartved, in Riviera Beach Florida. We choose Dustin because he is a true artisan that takes pride in his work and is very easy to work with.  His philosophy towards distillation is to use quality products and processes in every step of the process, beginning with fermentation and ending in a quality finished product. The proof of his dedication is in the bottle!

 Why do we need to run a crowd funding campaign
Now Brands, is seeking to raise additional capital so that we may reach economies of scales in production, that will better enable us to market, advertise and expand distribution past our initial target market of Metro New York.  
Olde Imperial Mystic Vodka, is presently scheduled to launch the product in the 2nd quarter of 2016. 
What we are seeking 

Now Brands LLC is seeking to raise $48,000 US
We will us the funds as follows:
Increase production -                                     $26,000.00
Purchase Point of Sale Displays -              $  8,000.00
Banner Ads -                                                      $   2,000.00
Promotions / Advertising -                           $ 10,000.00
Enter Award Contests-                                   $   2,000.00





       
      
                                  
 Perks

To show our appreciation for your contribution to our campaign, we have some great Perks to send your way.  
   


            
Perks for our Silver - Gold and Platinum Contributors we have additional special perks for you to Include Personalized labeled Bottles of Old Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka. See perks section for more details
For $1000.00 contribution you are invited to attend our Product Launch Party in Metro New York.  Where you will enjoy  Good Food, Adult Beverages, and meet very interesting people!                                                                                         
Risks & Challenges  No business venture is without risk. We understand the market we are entering is tightly regulated, and is very competitive. Consumers may view our product as just novelty brand.  
Now Brands is confident that we will not only win over consumers with the quality of our Premium Product, but that we will also gain a competitive advantage of our competitors.
                                                                             


                                                  So how do we win over consumers?


It starts with basic consumer merchandising practices of:
Package, Price and Position
Package - Ole Imperial Mystic Hemp Infused Vodka, is package in a high shoulder pump clear glass bottle. Our full color front label ( shown above) will produced on glossy vinyl which will enhance the vibrant colors and have the package jump out at consumers, and off the shelves!
Price - Our premium Vodka with a super premium taste and package will be priced at an affordable price for such a superior Vodka. MSRP is $29.99 750ML
Position - We will achieve product placement and position based on pint of sale, promotions and packaging. 
We gain our competitive advantage not only through price, but with the quality of our product. Our product is Hand Crafted and Gluten free. Again, we are confident that the proof is in the pudding, in this case in the Vodka itself.  By submitting the product to  various beverage alcohol tasting competitions, we expect to win several awards.
Olde Imperial Mystic is not the only hemp infused alcoholic beverage on the market, But it will be the BEST.
                                                                               
                                     If you can't contribute 
 We know not everyone can contribute, but you can still help us succeed by getting the word out about our campaign and product.

 We remind you to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Call for Olde Imperial MYSTIC ( or just MYSTIC Vodka for short) Hemp Infused Vodka at your favorite watering hole, eatery or club.
Ask for it at your package store
Visit our website and social media pages    Disclaimer - You must be 21 or older in order to receive 750 ML bottle or bottles of Olde Imperial MYSTIC Hemp Infused Vodka. Proof of age will be required at time of delivery.

story:
Help 1708 Gallery Bring Two Nights of InLight to Richmond! 

Who We Are & What We're Doing:

1708 Gallery is a nonprofit contemporary art space committed to connecting the Richmond community with innovative, relevant, and high-caliber art and artists. InLight Richmond is 1708’s FREE annual exhibition of temporary light-based art and performance that moves around the city each year. Since 2008, InLight has transformed significant Richmond landmarks and sites including the Arts and Culture District, historic Tredegar Ironworks, the Riverfront Canal Walk, and Monroe Park. 

This year, InLight 2015 will welcome audiences to the grounds of the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts! InLight will feature installations from national artists selected by juror Alex Baker, Director of Fleisher Ollman Gallery, Philadelphia, and special projects from Zach Kurth-Nelson, Derek Larson, Ander Mikalson and John Dombrowski, Jacco Olivier, and Mark Strandquist.   

1708’s InLight invites the community to experience parts of the city through the eyes of artists with projections that transform facades of buildings, interactive projects that invite audiences to become collaborators in the creation of artwork, The Community Lantern Parade that celebrates creativity of all forms, and much, much more.  

InLight has grown each year and is now one of Richmond’s  MOST popular fall events.  Thousands experience it each fall –over 9000 filled Monroe Park last year – and we want thousands MORE to have the opportunity! Help us make InLight 2015 a two night event! InLight is not to be missed!

If you’ve loved InLight in the past, this is your chance to give back. Help us continue to energize our creative community and vibrant city!


What We Need & What You Get

THE NEED: 

Richmond loves art!  Richmond loves VMFA!  Richmond loves 1708’s InLight! We want as many audience members as possible to experience the grounds of VMFA transformed by light-based art!

On November 13 and 14, thousands of visitors will wander the museum campus inspired by the artwork and captivated by the energy of the crowd! Richmond has embraced InLight. Help us keep InLight on view for a second night and let thousands MORE experience InLight!

We are so close to our fundraising goals and we are asking you to help us raise the final dollars to make it happen. Your contribution to InLight Night Two will help us:  

  • Support InLight artists through stipends and professional production

  • Support special Second Night performances and activities

  • Support the logistics that keep InLight visitors safe and happy

  • Welcome an even larger audience to InLight!


WHAT YOU GET: 

You are helping us!  Let us thank you with some 1708 and InLight loot! All levels come with the knowledge that you helped this beloved Richmond event  grow!

$10 LEVEL: You get a 1708 bumper sticker and a glow stick!  You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website.

$25 LEVEL: You get a 1708/ InLight Silkscreen T-Shirt and a glow stick! You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website.

$35 LEVEL: A 1708 / InLight Tote Bag and a glow stick! You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website.

$50 LEVEL:  You get to pick out a Monster Drawing Rally Artwork and a glow stick! You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website and recognized in the sponsor presentation at InLight 2015.

Example MDR Prints:

Lizzy Servito, 11" x 15", 2014

Michael Lease, 9" x 12", 2014

$100 LEVEL: 1708 / InLight SWAG bag – Tote Bag, T-Shirt, Monster Drawing Rally Artwork and a glow stick! You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website and recognized in the sponsor presentation at InLight 2015.

$300 LEVEL:  A 35th Anniversary Portfolio print, a 1708 bumper sticker and a glow stick! You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website, recognized in the sponsor presentation at InLight 2015 and recognized in the InLight 2015 map & program.

Our 35th Anniversary Portfolio features limited edition works by the following artists:

Amy Chan Carson Fox Suzanna Fields Andy Kozlowski Avery Lawrence Nichole Maury Christopher Quirk Jon Sheridan Kimberly Witham  Rebekah Wostrel

Amy Chan, Star Coral Belt, 2013, Screenprint on paper, 13” x 15”

Carson Fox,Vanished Youth, 2013, Digital print with hand punching, 15 5/8” x 13”

Andy Kozlowski, Mono Lith, 2013, Screenprint, 13” x 10”

$500 LEVEL: A framed glass word of your choosing by local artist Sarah Mizer, a 1708 bumper sticker and a glow stick! You'll also be listed as an InLight Supporter on the InLight website, recognized in the sponsor presentation at InLight 2015 and recognized in the InLight 2015 map & program.

Sarah Rebekah Byrd Mizer, Your Very Own Piece of Pie, Glass, 8 x 8 x 3", 2009

Color options. The colors in the photo are fairly accurate though the Aquamarine is more Aqua than pictured.


The Impact

InLight's audience grows each year. From 2013 to 2014, attendance grew by over 2500 visitors. Yet with it being just one night, so many miss out! A second night invites many more visitors from the Richmond area, Central Virginia, and beyond to experience InLight!  


Risks & Challenges

Producing a two-night InLight has been a topic of consideration for several years. However, InLight is an expensive project and while 1708 has had fantastic sponsors over many years, the total costs to produce a second night have been too high a barrier.  

This year, the unique opportunity to have InLight on the grounds of VMFA has inspired many of our supporters to increase their sponsorship of InLight and help make this notion a reality. 

We are close to our goal and hope that you will help us raise the final necessary funds!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a financial contribution, there are other ways that you can help!

  • Ask friends, family, and colleagues to help spread the word and make some noise about our campaign. You can share through Indiegogo!
  • Invite friends, family, and colleagues to InLight! 
  • Volunteer at InLight!
  • Come to InLight!
