story:
Networking doesn’t always come easy. Feeling awkward, fake, or frustrated is common.

Connecting authentically, being genuine, and bringing your true self to your networking style is possible and I’m here to show you how.

My name is Lindsay Johnson and I started The Networking Boutique, a Toronto based training company, that specialises in teaching professionals concrete networking and social skills for business growth and professional advancement. 

I've been coaching entrepreneurs and professionals for years. I've combined a systematised approach of developing clients' networking skills while addressing social awkwardness, sabotaging professional behaviours, and mental blocks for effective and authentic connecting.

Today, I want to offer more. I want to bring the success of The Networking Boutique, and all the knowledge I've gained and shared over the last decade, into every living room across the country and beyond. 

This Indiegogo campaign will support the development of an interactive online learning platform and multiple training video series including my core program, The Networking Game Plan.

These training videos will be available to anyone,  any day, anytime, anywhere.


Networking is about more than knowing what to say and how to say it. It's about connecting authentically, being genuine, and bringing your true self to the conversation. 

Building a relationship is just as important as building a resume.

The new website and online monthly memberships will contain interactive videos, exclusive content and training, and homework assignments that will tackle different topics that prompt specific questions and insight about your networking needs, challenges, and personality to build your own unique, personalised networking game plan. 

The Networking Boutique teaches you how to network by coming out of your shell, connecting authentically, and developing your networking and social skills.

Whether you find yourself in social or professional settings, The Networking Boutique will teach you how to:

  • discover your unique networking personality and how to master any event
  • create a networking game plan so you are ready to rock any time, any where
  • develop your social skills
  • engage and connect authentically with existing networks
  • build new networks
  • network effectively on social media and online
  • find your voice, passion, and message and share them with the world
  • learn step-by-step networking instructions
  • knock down your walls of fear, anxiety, frustration and comparison




Your contributions will not only score you some helpful perks, your money will also be put to good use by allowing me to:

  • Hire a digital marketing agency to solidify my brand and rebuild my website to include online content and courses

  • Hire a production company to create the interactive online training videos and promotional material

  • Hire marketing and advertising professionals

  • Hire public relations, branding, and graphic design professionals

  • Purchase required online platforms and recording equipment for creating video and audio content online

Let's talk perks.

Whether you want to contribute a little and be added to our online community, pick up a sweet deal on some private coaching sessions with me, book a large scale training for you and your team, or snag advanced downloads of my training videos....there's something for everyone.

Three of the perks I'm most excited about are: 

1. "Networking Game Plan" private training session. This training session is the heart and soul of The Networking Boutique. Here I combine strategic networking training with a completely personalised and customisable game plan built specifically for you based on what you do, your networking needs, and your personality. You'll be ready to connect authentically any time, anywhere, with anyone! 

2. 3 Private Sessions + Networking Etiquette training video. Snag a great price on 3 private sessions with me plus an etiquette video that will provide you with concrete Do's & Don'ts for effective, authentic, and fun networking. You'll be able to apply these tips as well as learn new skills to up your networking game!

3. Monthly Membership Subscription. Join an online community and receive exclusive content, videos, tips and homework assignments to keep you learning, growing, and in action all month long! 




I've shared a few client testimonials below. You can read more about me and what I've been up to online by visiting my website at TheNetworkingBoutique.com 

“Lindsay holds you to your word, and gives you the tools to follow through with weekly tasks you work on together”

“Lindsay’s no-nonsense approach with direct and practical tools helped me get results much faster than I ever would have on my own” - Marie Bodine, mariebodine.com

“Lindsay’s approach to networking was the most valuable “how-to” session I have ever participated in. Her approach is customized, tactical and honest...” - Mathew R Duffy, MBA, MMA

“After years of attending events I felt I was a bit of a "wall flower". In a few short sessions Lindsay was able to coach me through my weaknesses and now I approach events in a more strategic way…” - Anna Oliver, annaoliver.ca  

“Lindsay helped me by asking some very tough questions and guiding me out of my previously held assumptions and beliefs. The result was immediate...I found the experience very enlightening and concrete” Sergio Medrano, sergiomedranorealtor.com

“Great session Lindsay. I have been wanting to know how to introduce myself for over a year. You put it all together for me in less than 3 minutes. Amazing!” Janali Davis

“Lindsay's passion, heart, insight and skill set allow her to connect immediately with others and support their higher selves. If you get the opportunity to be around Lindsay, to talk to her, work with her, take it! You will be a better person because of it!” Phil Knapp

“Lindsay’s charismatic personality creates a comfortable atmosphere and she provided tips and tools individually catered to my needs, which can help the shyest person (like me)  to start networking.” Priya Bedi

"I was reminded [by Lindsay] of the importance of “being a resource” to others. This simple, yet profound concept, elevates networking by removing the 'what I need' from 'how can I help others and in turn help myself?'. This is a networking game-changer!" Dana Sirri

You can read more here...

I look forward to working with you and I am beyond grateful for your support and belief in what I am working hard to accomplish and create.

Thank you, 

Lindsay Johnson

story:
***Please note***

Don’t be daunted by our super high goal. We didn’t realize we wouldn’t be able to adjust this. We have investors who will help us significantly in reaching the goal, but we still need to raise as much as we can through the campaign. Thanks for all your support!


An Exciting New Choice for Kinky Folk. Support HavenSF

Your life is busy, you don’t always have the opportunity to go out and enjoy yourself, but this Friday night you have no other obligations, and you can go out and get your kink on. What if the only SF kink party doesn't fit your desires?  Here, in what is arguably the kinkiest city in the country, you often have no choice! 

Announcing:

Haven SF

A new choice for kinky community. 
Opening late 2016 with your support


What Do We Need?

Your support!! We are currently pre-selling party passes, swag and more. Pick a perk in the right hand column, click “get this perk” and be one of the first people to buy from Haven SF. The money contributed to this campaign will be used to get Haven off the ground. If for any reason we cannot open the doors (which we don’t foresee) we will refund your money.

What is Haven SF?

Our mission statement: Haven SF is a BDSM and kink play space that provides a safe environment fostering community and acceptance. Haven SF focuses on the full experiences of our guests, providing them the tools, resources and events they need to fully realize and enjoy their kinks. Through parties, classes, and community events we provide a place for people to get to know themselves and one another. Haven strives to exist in a way that bolsters other kink and BDSM businesses and the community as a whole.

How will we fulfill our mission:

  • Creating incredible events to add some variety to the already existing options
  • Providing a spacious interior with lots of room to play
  • Maintaining a clean and well kept facility
  • Having welcoming hosts and owners who help people interact with and get to know one another
  • Being accessible to those with disabilities
  • Providing orientations that help new comers learn the ropes – pun intended ;)
  • Creating a transparent consent policy to keep everyone safe
  • Fostering open communication with local BDSM and kink business owners
  • Encouraging guests to patronize local BDSM and kink businesses
  • Hosting events that foster community and education
  • Working with kink and BDSM groups in the city
  • Supporting kink and BDSM non-profits in the city
  • Providing an environment that not only welcomes all ages (18+), genders, races, sexual orientations, body shapes and sizes, levels of ability/disability, and kinky orientations, we encourage them

Regarding our fundraising goal:

We need you to show your support through pre-purchasing items. You can choose a perk on the right hand side and proceed with your purchase. We are currently talking to investors and lenders and expect we will have some funding outside of this crowdfunder. Your support will help us show the investors that Haven SF is something that San Francisco wants!

What are we raising money for?

·  Securing a location. We are actively viewing spaces to solidify a location.

·  Permits and licenses, to make sure you are safe. We also want to make sure that everything is legal so that we don’t risk being shut down. (It helps that Caleb is a lawyer).

·  Dungeon Furniture, to make sure you have everything you need for an amazing scene.

What if you don’t open?

While we in no way anticipate that, please note that if we are unable to open a space we will refund contributions. These contributions are pre-purchasing items at Haven. If we cannot fulfill that we will not keep your money.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially right now? We welcome your moral support! You can show it by:

  • Sending us an encouraging message
  • Sharing this on Facebook
  • Tweet out this campaign
  • Tell your friends about the campaign!
  • Check out our website (and sign up for updates while you are there).TheHavenSF.com

Who is creating Haven SF? Matt & Caleb

We met two years ago and it was a perfect fit from day one. After a shockingly short courting process we moved in together, with Matt officially adopting Caleb’s cats and treating them as his own. Over the past two years our lives have grown together in incredible ways. As this growth happened we found ourselves wanting to create a business with the same love and care we’ve given to our relationship.  

We have found we have very opposite professional skills, which put us in a unique position to create an amazing experience for you. Caleb is an attorney and has his MBA. Prior to practicing law Caleb worked in business management. In 2016 we put our skills together and started hosting kinky parties at dungeons. Our first party pulled in almost 150 people and we knew we had found something we enjoyed and were really good at! The love of throwing parties turned into a dream of opening our own space to serve the community in a whole new way. Thus, Haven SF was born.

An
Exciting New Choice for Kinky Folk. Support HavenSF
Your life is busy, you
don’t always have the opportunity to go out and enjoy yourself, but this
Friday night you have no other obligations, and you can go out and get
your kink on. What if the only SF kink party doesn't fit your desires?  Here,
in what is arguably the kinkiest city in the country, you often have no choice! 
Announcing:
Haven SF
A new choice for kinky community. 
Opening late 2016 with your support

the ground. If for any reason we cannot open the doors (which we don’t foresee)
we will refund your money.

kink play space that provides a safe environment fostering community and
acceptance. Haven SF focuses on the full experiences of our guests, providing
them the tools, resources and events they need to fully realize and enjoy their
kinks. Through parties, classes, and community events we provide a place for
people to get to know themselves and one another. Haven strives to exist in a
way that bolsters other kink and BDSM businesses and the community as a whole.

story:
As of today, the SMA is in dire need of funds both in order to construct a ramp in order to make the SMA's new home, the Pink Lady, fully accessible on our first level to all visitors, but also to cover the costs of unpacking and setting up materials in our new home.

We are not yet able to open completely to the public without these crucial items, and though we are open by appointment, we are eager to fully open our doors to the community.

Help us make it happen!

Every donation helps get us closer to being able to fully open and we thank you in advance for your support at any level, be that a donation, sharing our campaign, emailing your networks on our behalf -- all of it helps!

We need specific funds for:

Three 8-foot bookcases with library ladders for SMA's books ($400 each, total $1200) UPDATE: We have enough funds raised to purchase these much-needed items! THANK YOU!!

Three 6-foot metal shelving units for SMA's Organizational & Personal Collections & Large Periodical Bins ($80 each, total $240)

Signage for SMA's Rooms: 8 Hallway Signs with Wall Mounts ($35 each, $280 total)

Text Displays and Signs for Leslie Feinberg Library ($200, estimated)

Art Hanging System for Gallery ($300, approximately)

Art Display Furniture, with moveable panels and drawers ($400, estimated)

Art Frames ($20 each x 50 = $1,000) 

...and to build a ramp on the front of the house (costs are still being finalized, but we estimate the cost to be between $5,000 and $12,000)

We are honored to announce that we have a matching grant in the amount of $400 from Jean and Mary Savarese of Northampton, MA!  Their words: 

Dear Book Lovers,

Now more than ever, the sound of silence is unacceptable. We need to
allow LGBT books and archives to exist! I am writing about the Sexual
Minorities Archives in Holyoke that houses Out Books On Wheels.

Mary and I are helping the Archives open its doors by making a donation
through the Indigogo appeal and ask you to join us.

- We will match the first $400 received so that 2 bookcases can be bought. Your $1 donation will have a $2 value! And it's fully tax deductible.

Book cases need to be purchased to house hundreds of archival books 
sitting in boxes on the community room floor where public events Should 
be taking place. in addition, the Archives cannot open its doors to the 
public (for borrowing of Out Books or studying archival information) until a ramp is built. Let's do this...

Any amount of your gift will help! Be an active part of LGBTQ voices in 
our Valley!

Thank you for ensuring that LGBTQ literature is saved and available,
Jean Savarese
Volunteer

(Jean & Mary, thank you so very much for your generous support!)

The Sexual Minorities Archives has brought to Holyoke its vast holdings of books, periodicals, subject files, art, music, textiles, and multimedia comprising the diverse story of LGBTQI lives and experiences from the early 1800s to the present. The SMA has recently acquired, among hundreds of new items, The Leslie Feinberg Library and plans to provide access to those assembled 1,000 books within the Holyoke house in The Sylvia Rivera Room. The addition of the personal research library of Feinberg, the late transgender author and activist, will bring the total number of books in the SMA to over 12,000.

The SMA collections, open to the public, researchers, and visitors at no charge, had been housed in the Northampton residence of Ben Power Alwin, founder and executive director of the Sexual Minorities Educational Foundation, Inc. (SMEF) and curator of the Sexual Minorities Archives. SMEF, Inc. the federal 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that furthers the work of the SMA, has also relocated its offices to within the house in Holyoke. The SMA welcomed between 300 to 500 visitors each year, many of them students and professors from the Five Colleges area, and offers paid student internships and other employment opportunities for LGBTQI individuals through grants and scholarship programs.

We are eager to be able to provide regular open hours to these unparalleled, unique historical materials to all who come to the Pink Lady. 

Our goal is to build a beautiful, permanent ramp built to match the exterior of the Pink Lady on the front of the house. We are in a historic Queen Anne Victorian-era house near Holyoke's local Fairfield Avenue Historic District. We want all people to be able to access these materials and we intend for this ramp to be safe and welcoming.

We also intend to continue to raise funds for a fully accessible bathroom on the first level of the SMA, which we do not currently have. We recognize this as an important and crucial need and is one we intend to have happen in order to ensure an open, accessible, and welcoming space. 

Donations are tax-deductible.

story:
The RippSaver is a fun and stylish SPF50+ rash shirt which doubles as a swimming aid.   

The Shirt

The RippSaver shirts are made from an extremely strong, chlorine and saltwater resistant material. They come in a variety of colours including blue, pink, yellow, aqua & fuchsia. You will also have your choice of long or short sleeves. AND, we are also in the process of designing our own unique RippSaver patterns which will be exclusive to our shirts!

Colours & Patterns

The colours of the main body of the shirt will remain the same as shown here and on our website.

pink, fuchsia, blue, aqua & yellow.

  • Patterned sleeves and designs will change slightly but will remain in the colour tones to suit.
  • Patterns will be suitable as per age group and gender.
  • The end result being a stylish and smart looking rashie using bright colours and patterns, which will make you feel great and look fantastic!

 

The Details

An inflatable bladder is stitched into the lining of the shirt, and loops all the way around the torso, under the arms.

The bladder is inflated orally via a small unobtrusive tube, which is located on the left breast area near the armpit, or on the back of the shirt in the toddler version. This tube contains a specially designed one-way valve, which makes the inflation process extremely easy.

The tube is made of soft flexible rubber, and once inflated, it tucks away neatly inside the pocket.

 

   

  

Who Is It For?

The RippSaver was originally designed with children’s safety in mind. However, it has now been expanded to accommodate all ages, from toddlers to adults, and even Nan & Pop. 

The RippSaver comes in sizes for all ages, and a variety of different colours and patterns in both long and short sleeve.

With such variety available we’re sure you will find a look which suits your personal style and taste, regardless of your age.

 

"Our RippSaver Rashie sure has come along way. From our humble beginnings to this present time, we can honestly say we have a superior quality product to offer you now. We are all so proud of what the RippSaver has become."

 

We have been working our little butts off for the last 12 months, and the good news is that we have almost everything in place and ready to go.

RippSaver is ready to move into the manufacturing stage, and we need your help:

  • To manufacture moulds for our unique bladder and one-way valve.
  • To purchase the best grade materials for the bladder.
  • To purchase chlorine resistant fabrics for the shirt.
  • To create our new unique designs for RippSavers signature look.
  • And of course to help us spread the word!

To achieve these goals we need to raise $20,000 AUD

In return for supporting our campaign, we are very proud to offer you the following perks:

 

A Little Bit About The Little Scallywagz!

The Little Scallywagz have been entertaining children and adults Australia wide for over a decade.

Their performances have captivated young audiences with their high energy and upbeat catchy songs, written by 9 times Australian award winning songwriter, Stacy Tierney.

The Scallywagz have kindly supported the RippSaver from the beginning, and we are eternially  grateful for all their help and encouragement.

Now they have gone one step further and are generously offering one of their fun, catchy songs as a perk for supporting our campaign.

Visit the Scallywagz at:
www.thelittlescallywagz.com.au
 

Ripp, The RippSaver Dog!

Ripp is kind of a mascot for our RippSaver shirt. He is a happy, outgoing and adventurous dog, who loves to swim, splash and have fun in the water.

We created Ripp as a way to engage with children in a fun and memorable way, in order to educate them on the dangers of the pool and beach.

His message is simple: Have fun in the water, and stay safe!

 

FAQ

Does the RippSaver have certification?

We are in the process of having the range of RippSaver swim shirts certified to comply with all standards worldwide. We will have certification in place by the time we are ready to ship our swim shirts.

When will I receive my RippSaver Swim Shirt order?

Shipping will commence four weeks after the campaign ends.

How will I receive my RippSaver Swim Shirt?

All RippSaver Swim Shirts will be sent via courier direct to your home or business.

What colours and sizes does the RippSaver Swim Shirt come in?

The RippSaver Swim Shirt will be available in all sizes, ranging from babies to the elderly. Colours include: Blue, Pink, Yellow, Aqua & Fuchsia.

I run a business that would require a bulk order of RippSaver Swim Shirt, are these available at any discount?

Yes, one of our IndieGoGo perks, will allow you to place a bulk order for 30 RippSaver Swim Shirts for the special price of $1,350. But hurry, there are one 20 available!

What if I want a special order including club logo’s and club colours?

Contact info@rippsaver.com and let us know your requirements and we will do our best to accomodate your needs.

Why is the RippSaver Swim Shirt better than other Swimming aids?

In addition to helping you stay afloat, the RippSaver Swim Shirt protects you from the sun. It’s SPF50+ rating provides maximum protection from harmful UV rays. No other swimming aid can boast this feature.

Does the RippSaver come with short or long sleeves?

The RippSaver Swim Shirt is available in both short or long sleeves, although we recommend long sleeves to give you maximum protection from the sun.

How do I look after my RippSaver Swim Shirt?

Each RippSaver Swim Shirt comes with all care and use directions, simply hand wash your RippSaver and hang to dry, Do not machine wash or place in a tumble dryer.

What is the bladder made of?

The bladder is made of a new patented rubber material, that is resistant to salt water, chlorine and is also non allergenic. The bladder is our own special design which gives greater buoyancy without compromising freedom of movement.

Does the RippSaver Swim Shirt come with a warranty?

Every RippSaver Swim Shirt and bladder comes with a standard international warranty. (12 months bladder replacement for faulty workmanship).

If I have a problem with my RippSaver Swim Shirt, or have a warranty claim, what do I do?

If you have any problems associated with your RippSaver Swim Shirt please do not hesitate to contact one of our friendly staff at info@rippsaver.com

Can I order a replacement bladder?

Absolutely. To do so please contact our sales department at info@rippsaver.com and one of our friendly staff will help you with your request.

 

Some Additional Information

Children are most at risk of drowning.

1.2 Million people drown every year! That's 2.2 people each and every minute. 50% of these are children.  Source: The International Lifesaving Federation, islf.org/content/drowning

We are passionate about helping save lives and we genuinely believe that the RippSaver can help make a real difference.

We have also selected 4 charities that support children. We will be donating 50cents from every RippSaver shirts sold worldwide to each of those four charities.

If you cannot pledge a donation you can still help by sharing us on your social media and telling your friends and family about our wonderful new product.

facebook.com/rippsaver

info@rippsaver.com

www.rippsaver.com

Please, please, please help us!

Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

Our dad has had a longtime passion for gourmet food and grilling.  He shared that passion with us at an early age and we now share that same passion.  We are excited to share our love and passion for grilling with you.  

We are really happy to be working with award-winning chef, Michael Lachowicz.

"These are lots of rubs and grilling spices out there, but none like this one!  It is so good you'll never want to use anything else", says Michael Lachowicz, Chef/Owner of Restaurant Michael in Winnetka, Illinois.   

We'll be posting recipes and tips from Michael throughout the campaign.

We've put together a great group of Perks for your contribution.   Please review the offerings and make your contribution.  Grilled food never tasted so good!


What We Need & What You Get

We want to bring this amazing product into every kitchen.  We are going to need funds for marketing and public relations.    Our goal amount is modest and we will use whatever we raise to try and build this brand into a household name. 

The Impact

The world is going to be a happier place when more people start eating A.J. & Ethan's!  :)    

Risks & Challenges

We are hard working guys and we love to give back.  We know that there is a lot of hard work ahead of us, but we are committed to making this company a success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please contribute and tell your friends about this awesome product.  We hope that you don't wait, please contribute today!

Happy Grilling,

A.J. & Ethan Louis

story:
Short Summary

I've done it! I've actually started a business.

I am a working mother that has had varying degrees of success in reaching my breastfeeding goals. The main difference from one child to the next was employer support. The first job had no lactation program, including no access to a private location during the day, no discounts for necessary (expensive) equipment, and no access to trained support. I didn't even come close to my nursing goals.

With my next child I had a much better experience. After exceeding my breastfeeding goals it became abundantly clear that employer support matters. So, I pursued a bachelor's degree in Community Health and Behavior Change, a certification to become a Lactation Consultant and started The Lactation Room. The Lactation Room will assist small to mid-sized businesses in providing the best possible lactation program based on the organization's needs. 

What We Need 

I need your help getting started. I hope to raise over $1500 by August 25! I am one out of 20 people that has been accepted to the Black upStart Bootcamp. There were over 100 applicants! The Black upStart boot camp is a program that will help me narrow my focus, understand some business basics, set up a strategic plan, and most of all assist me with "The Pitch". The cost of the camp is $500. 

All additional funds will be used toward other startup costs such as licensing, marketing, logo and web design.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Spread the word! 
  • Advice is welcome
  • Services are always welcome

story:
MAKE THE MEAL A FUNNY AND CREATIVE EXPERIENCE!

 

Hi guys! My name is Noemi, I'm a 30 years old Sardinian girl. I have been travelling a lot through Italy, Spain, UK, Mexico and Australia, and during my trips I've had a great inspiration for a possible succesful business! My project is to start a business that could change dining habits! Let me introduce you to the project!


INTERACTIVE RESTAURANT

 

Make restaurant's ordering system, funny, social and creative!

Have you ever thought about how could be cool to have the possibility to "assemble" your pizza by choosing between the available ingredients? and what about salads? How many times have you ordered a "green salad" and just once served you have found inside some vegetables you don't like? won't be better if you could choose every vegetable, fruit, sauce, of your salad????  

And what if you are vegetarian or vegan? or allergic to lactose or gluten?  I guess you always have some problems when you are about to order a meal in a restaurant... in these cases it's not easy to find the right solution for you diet needs! Well, in my restaurant, you could have the possibility to examine and personally choose every single ingredient, avoinding bad surprises! 

Thanks to your help, me and my team will be able to open the First Italian Interactive Restaurant, where customer will be the main protagonist of the business!

 

LET THE SHOW BEGINS!

 

In the video below, you can see some restaurants that have already adopted this kind of technology. As you can see, it turns classics dining tables into super gigant touch screen tables. Tables are provided with a software that allows customers to "project" their meal from A to Z. 

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Customers can:

- Personalize their meal by choosing every ingredient between the ones available in the "ingredients' lists" in just one touch; 

- Name and share their creations in social networks in real time;

- Chat directly from the tables to involve their friends;

- Keep contact with  restaurant's staff;

- Play games, read news and, of course, eat!

 

WHERE AND WHEN

 

Our aim is to open the first restaurant in Sardinia. We plan to start the activity in the next six months, but we need your help to raise the money!!

This will be just the beginning of our project, because the real goal is to create a chain of restaurants under the same brand, exporting this technology in other countries.

 

INTERACTIVE RESTAURANT SYSTEM: WHY IT'S SO WONDERFUL!

 

 

Now, let's understand the potential of these tables. As explained before, customers can set up their own meal by selecting the ingredients they like the most. But how?  Let us give you an example to describe how  the system works.

Let's suppose that a customer would like to eat a salad; he can create its own salad in the following way: 

  1. In the table's screen, customer will have a virtual salad bowl and all the ingredients available; 
  2. Customer have to drag and drop the ingredients inside the virtual bowl. Ingredients could be, for example, tomatoes, lettuce, sweet peas, carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, meat or fish (like chicken or tuna), dry or fresh fruit, sausages, cheese, dressings and so on;
  3. Once ingredients have been dragged inside the bowl, customer is welcome to give a name to his personalized and customized salad;
  4. Finally, customer will send the order directly to the kitchen and the game is done.

And this is just the beginning!!! this amazing system allows customers to do many more things! Tables are connected to the Internet ALL THE TIME and customers can:

- stay connected with social medias like Facebook, Istagram, etc;

- create a meal in company setting free their creativity;

-  socialize with new people by chatting with them through tables;

- share creations (like meals, drinks, salads, etc) and any other content with friends through social medias;

- share any content of the table storage like videos, pictures and music;

- play games like, for example, "fruit ninja" and many others while waiting for the meal;

- have a look to what is happening in the kitchen in real time, thanks to a video camera linked to the tables;

- have a look to news, meteo and so on.

Furthermore, as previously mentioned, tables are linked each other, so customers can chat through tables, send postcards or offer to other guests any product available in the menu with just one click!
And, of course, customers can make orders and payments through the table, without having to wait for the assistance of a staff member!

Obviously, if customers need assistance, they can call a staff member through tables and these ones will be glad to help.

Every application listed above is showed in the videos uploaded in this page. For this reason, I invite you to watch carefully each video. The videos come from our partner Kodisoft.

 

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?

 

The budget collected will cover the following expense:

- Purchase and transport of tables. Seventy percent of the budget will be absorbed by this expense;

- three wood-burning ovens equipped with rotating and "up and down" technology. In order to fulfill to italian laws, one of the ovens will be completely dedicated to gluten free pizzas and others gluten free bakery products, to avoid any contamination of the food and help celiac people to taste the best food ever.

- Professional training courses;

- Kitchen equipment:  fridge, deep fryers, sinks, dishwasher, hobs, bar counter etc.;

- Website;

- Restructuring and adjustment costs of room and toilets to comply with Italian health laws regarding restaurants;

- Marketing and promotional campaign;

- First supply of good including.

If the entire goal won't be reached, the money will be dedicated, at first, for the supply of the tables and for professional training courses.

 

BUSINESS MODEL

 

INTERACTION, CREATIVITY AND CUSTOMIZATION:

these three elements constitute the SOUL of our business.

In our restaurant customers will be the main protagonist; every service, product, event and game will be evaluted, rated and also proposed by customers. How? thanks to the possibility  they'll have to like or dislike products and services leaving feedback visible to everybody; to interact with management leaving messages to propose new ideas related to the business. In this way customers will have the possibility to participate to the creation of new value, for themselves, for the business and for other customers. 

PRODUCTS AND SPECIAL NEEDS

Nowadays, many people are experiencing problems of intolerance with some aliments that contains lactose or gluten; others have chosen to adopt a vegetarian or vegan diet and have difficulties to find a good offer of these kind of dishes in restaurants.

For these reasons, we have decided to offer a selection of ingredients and goods that respect different diet choices and special diet needs.

For vegans and lactose intolerant, mozzarella will be replaced by a mozzarella free of milk and others aliments of animal origin; meat will be replaced by soy meat and  meat sousages will be replaced by soy/tofu/vegetable sousages; cow milk will be replace by almond/soy/nut milk and so on.

For people with celiac disease, will be used the special gluten free flour to make pizzas and other products. In the same way, will be selected a range of ingredients free of gluten.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

 

Cagliari it's a small city, so it's easy to create some buzz, especially when it comes from technological innovation. Cagliari's people are curious and love to have fun; we never lost a social event, a pub inauguration or a cool party. Exciting news are really rare in a such small city.

    For these reasons, we think the inauguration will be a real success: we expect to have every seat busy and, hopefully, to have a long line at the entrance to come in and try these shiny new tables!

    Furthermore, we expect a so positive result because, with this innovation, we are going to  touch the most sensitive strings of our future customers: to have the possibility to express themselves, and be for once actors and not mere spectators. Furthermore, one of the levers of our success will be the deep and strong  interconnection that has been created over the past years between people, internet and social media. As you know, people is thrilled to buy the last model of smartphone, to share on facebook the last funny picture taken or the last beautiful pub/beach/museum visited! People LOVE to involve their friends, and be involved in their friends' lives through social networks! In the same way, we LOVE all new devices that allow us to do such things. If you combine this with the possibility to have fun creating a personalized meal, the game is done!  WE ARE SOCIAL. People have never been so much interconnected and we like that! The result? Smartphones have become an extension of our arm because internet has become the expression of our thoughts. Finally we can share our thoughts with a wide range of people, comparing ourselves with them and their points of view.

    After initial excitement, the challenge will be to make sure that consumers will continue to visit the restaurant; this goal will be pursued trying to create a deep connection through customer and the business.

    As told before, consumers will be involved continuously in business decisions, making them feeling the protagonist and the centre of the business; secondly, restaurant will offer ONLY fresh food and ingredients of high quality, renewing the "ingredients list" and menu proposals based on seasonal availability of aliments; furthermore, will be organized many contests aiming to involve and reward clients and many events to entertain them and keep their satisfaction level high.

     

    PERKS: PROMOTE AND ENHANCE YOUR BRAND AWARENESS! 

     

    IRT tables are not only a tool by which place orders or play games; they also are a POWERFUL ADVERTISING CHANNEL that allows to enhance BRAND AWARENESS and promote any kind of business.Through tables, companies' promotional ads can be continuously broadcasted, companies websites can be listed in a special page completely dedicated to donors and customers can browse the web, share companies websites in social medias  or buy their products. 

    Furthermore, in the restaurant there will be a wall dedicated to donors, in which will be written their names (if donors are private people), companies' name and/or companies' website, to give them a wide visibility.  

    Depending on the amount of your financial help to the project, you'll be rewarded with:

    - Publication on tables of an advertisement prepared directly by you, to promote your business;

    - Registration of your company in the page dedicated to financial lenders, with a direct link to the company website;

    - Direct sale on site of your products for promotional purposes;

    - Insert your signature (or website adress) in the restaurant wall;

    - Have your name in our special plates;

    With IRT technology, everyone can control an absolutely new and unbelievably powerful advertising channel. It’s like broadcasting your own TV channel, but with even more control.

Brewery and Taproom

We will design our brewery around the taproom. By focusing on the taproom, we are creating a business that not only brews great beer, but provides the community with a fun, safe social scene.

We want people to enjoy our beer. In our taproom. In our great city of New Orleans.

We Need Equipment, You Need Perks

We are looking to raise $10,000 for purchasing the actual brewing equipment. Our small 1-barrel brewing system makes us a true "Nano-Brewery", perfect for brewing small-batch hand crafted beer, one barrel at a time.

To get you excited about backing us, we've thought up a few "Perks". Check them out to the right and in the pictures below. You can also contribute any amount you'd like by clicking "Back It" towards the top of the page.

First Edition Glassware

 

Hand-Burned River Map Coasters

We're More Than Brew Bums

Our project is about more than just beer, it's about making our community a better place. We support our local small business economy whenever possible, working with local farmers and maltsters to get the freshest grains to brew truly local beer.

Although the brewery will be small, we plan to offer employment to people struggling through these difficult economic times. We are developing a program to provide these people with a job, phone, and reliable transportation.

We value education, and plan to provide students with part-time science and business based internships.

Why "Southern Cannon"

The brewery takes it's name from the legendary 141st Field Artillery Battalion of New Orleans, and honors the men and women throughout the centuries that have stood their ground and fought behind the cannons.

Founder and brewer Patrick Murphy serves with the 141st as a combat medic, and is proud to be among some of the finest soldiers and citizens our country has to offer.

"Try Us!"

It's a Tough Road

Although the brewing industry is thriving with no indication of slowing, opening a brewery (even a small one) is extremely difficult. It's not only equipment intensive, but the legal hoops are endless. Thankfully, our team can tackle all of these problems. With our combined experience, education, and creative brewing style, the Southern Cannon crew is set up for success.

So You Want In?

We hope that you can contribute to our financial goal, but if it's not in the cards don't worry! Often times, word of mouth is more valuable than money. So please, get the word out, and share our story with as many people as you see fit. We need all the help and encouragement we can get.

Cheers y'all!

story:
10 Carden (10C) is the hub for community activators and changemakers in Guelph.

We welcome groups and individuals into an inclusive community of social change organizations working across sectors and engaging in collaborative work. Our tangible offering is affordable downtown co-working and event meeting space. Our immeasurable benefits extend to inclusion, connection, collaboration, creativity, and developing new ways of solving social challenges. 

People work, meet, eat, create, connect and brainstorm together at 10C. 

10 Carden is in its 8th year and is expanding - and this growth is being realized through the redevelopment of a historic landmark in the core of our city, the former Acker's Furniture building, located at 42 Carden Street. The project is being undertaken by 10 Carden and Chalmers Community Services Centre as the property owners and core building tenants, and together, will activate the entire building.

In early 2017, we will open this fully accessible 15,000 square feet location. Help 10 Carden finish this community space!
 

10C is making space for community connections that foster: collaborations, new ideas, professional and social networks that build urban integration, resilience and establish the scaffolding for Guelph residents to work on complex issues together. All of these are important as Guelph (and other cities) grow in population due to provincial mandating and as challenges of urban living become more complex (i.e. water supply, energy costs, access to civic space, diversity, direct democracy and social inclusion). 10C helps people form connections and collaborate.

Support through this campaign will help finish the main floor and the second floor community gathering spaces.
 

  • Save the Date - we are planning an amazing community party on April 29, 2016.

  • Our goal is to raise $25,000 through this campaign. This will help with key finishing work required on the most active spaces on the main and second floors.

  • The first $10,000 raised through this campaign will finish the Carden Street Gallery-Lounge, which will become an active gathering space and act as the main entrance to 10C. This area needs new flooring and finishing carpentry, including reinstallation of tin ceiling to welcome visitors into the space.
     
  • The next $8,000 raised will help to refinish the warehouse floor, and add lighting, seating and furnishings on the 2nd floor Sunroom and Library area. This sunny spot will be a key area for people to meet, read, research and brainstorm. This is also the future home of the Out on the Shelf Library, Guelph's LGTBQ+ community resource centre. Hundreds of people will gather here weekly to soak up the sun and enjoy the views of Market Square. Join friends new and old in the space and be part of the action! 
     
  • The next $5000 raised will also help build and finish the gender-neutral barrier-free bathroom on the second floor. As noted, the building is full of practical and accessible features and our bathrooms are going to rock! 
     
  • Finally, any direct funds raised for the Acker's Sign Restoration will go towards the restoration of the large Acker's Furniture sign, which graced Carden Street from 1956 to 2016. The sign is currently in storage with Signs Galore in Breslau, awaiting its glorious return.
     

What you get in return...

  • Fun Perks Include: Stickers! T-Shirts! Photo Portraits! Get your name memorialized! This is your chance to join in the adventure and be part of this transformation of this landmark space. The opening party - one of our key perks will be a blast! Bring a friend or bring 10. With over 200 people coming to our bare-bones construction site opening in spring 2016, we are expecting a full-house!
  • What if you don't reach your campaign goal? Well, if we don't reach our goal, we will focus on the main floor space and complete as much of the work as possible. But, we really hope that you can help us reach the goal, and have created perks to provide you value, connection and enjoyment. 
  • And if we exceed our goal, then we will continue to add magic to the 3rd and 4th floors!

Is $25,000 going to make a difference in this big project? YOU BET!! Most of this project has been financed with a combination of a first mortgage and Community Bond social impact financing of over $700,000. We've also been fortunate with some capital and project grants, as well as individual and corporate sponsorships, which we will announce at the opening. Your support in this last leg of the campaign will make a HUGE difference. We are building community with - and in - community. 

Why Now?

10 Carden is ready and Guelph is also rapidly changing. Over the past 3 years, there has been a dramatic increase in the development of our downtown and several not-for-profit and social benefit organizations have already been displaced from the core of our city. Over the long-term, this may drastically change the quality and character of our city as a whole.

COMMUNITY INVESTMENT TO REALIZE A LONG-TERM HOME FOR 10 CARDEN AS A SOCIAL INNOVATION HUB IS ONE WAY TO ENSURE THAT AN ACCESSIBLE COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT SPACE REMAINS IN OUR DOWNTOWN - AVAILABLE TO ALL.

In addition to activating 4 floors plus the basement area, this project also offers the full top floor to large scale 180+ person arts, cultural and educational event activities, including the first Downtown Guelph Community Classroom in concert with the University of Guelph, Community Engaged Scholarship Institute and Student Life departments. The future of learning, collaboration and changemaking is here. 

This project brings together several social benefit organizations:

  • Chalmers Community Services Centre
  • University of Guelph, College of Social and Applied Human Sciences - Community Engaged Scholarship Institute
  • University of Guelph, Student Life
  • Guelph-Wellington Local Immigration Partnership
  • Out on the Shelf LGTBQ+ Library
  • Guelph Arts Council
  • Guelph Neighbourhood Support Coalition
  • Wellington Water Watchers
  • Taylor Newberry Consulting
  • Guelph Dance
  • Community Justice Initiatives
  • Main Power Corp.
  • Transformative Arts, and others underway.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • Use the INDIEGOGO share tools to help us spread the word!
      • Tell a friend about 10 Carden. They may want to become a member, a friend of 10 Carden, or an individual, student or organizational co-worker! Your artist friends may want to have shows in the gallery, your science friends may want to reveal a new discovery in the classroom. And, your foodie friends, well, they may want to play in the future community kitchen.

10 Carden is ready and Guelph is also rapidly changing. Over the past 3 years, there has been a dramatic increase in the development of our downtown and several not-for-profit and social benefit organizations have already been displaced from the core of our city. Over the long-term, this may drastically change the quality and character of our city as a whole.
COMMUNITY INVESTMENT TO REALIZE A LONG-TERM HOME FOR 10 CARDEN AS A SOCIAL INNOVATION HUB IS ONE WAY TO ENSURE THAT AN ACCESSIBLE COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT SPACE REMAINS IN OUR DOWNTOWN - AVAILABLE TO ALL.
In addition to activating 4 floors plus the basement area, this project also offers the full top floor to large scale 180+ person arts, cultural and educational event activities, including the first Downtown Guelph Community Classroom in concert with the University of Guelph, Community Engaged Scholarship Institute and Student Life departments. The future of learning, collaboration and changemaking is here. 
This project brings together several social benefit organizations:

Chalmers Community Services Centre
University of Guelph, College of Social and Applied Human Sciences - Community Engaged Scholarship Institute
University of Guelph, Student Life
Guelph-Wellington Local Immigration Partnership
Out on the Shelf LGTBQ+ Library
Guelph Arts Council
Guelph Neighbourhood Support Coalition
Wellington Water Watchers
Taylor Newberry Consulting
Guelph Dance
Community Justice Initiatives
Main Power Corp.
Transformative Arts, and others underway.



Other Ways You Can Help

Use the INDIEGOGO share tools to help us spread the word!

Tell a friend about 10 Carden. They may want to become a member, a friend of 10 Carden, or an individual, student or organizational co-worker! Your artist friends may want to have shows in the gallery, your science friends may want to reveal a new discovery in the classroom. And, your foodie friends, well, they may want to play in the future community kitchen.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Filipa Carreira, I am the founder of Wamina, a Mozambican social enterprise that disseminates information on the period and menstrual hygiene as well as access to affordable reusable menstrual pads for low income and vulnerable girls. My team includes Maura Couto, who is responsible for marketing e communications, and Mariana Lima, who is responsible for community outreach and public relations.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to raise 2000 USD to finance our awareness and marketing campaign to promote Wamina Pads,  an innovative and affordable menstrual product for low income and vulnerable girls in Mozambique. If we do not reach our goal of 2000 USD we will use the money to buy Wamina Pads and distribute them among vulnerable girls in orphanages.

The Impact

The reason why you should get involved in this project is that in Africa 1 in 10 girls drops out of school because they cannot afford menstrual hygiene products. By disseminating information of the period through Wamina booklets and workshops and making Wamina pads affordable we aim to reduce this statistic and by donating to this campaign you will be doing the same. Your donation will allow girls to manage their periods hygienically and with dignity. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge is to introduce the Wamina Pads in the market since it is an old concept adapted to the social, economic context of our target audience regarding such a taboo and sensitive subject such as the period. However, our team of experienced activists are skilled communicators and promotors are able to reach both our target audience (the girls) and our secondary audience (the parents) efficiently.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially to our campaign please help us disseminate our campaign through social media. You can support us by liking our facebook page and instagram /waminamz . And if you have the time and a special skill you can intern for us!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Caterina Barregar, Empowerment Diva

Professional Life Coach, Mentor Coach, Empowerment Coach, Reiki Master/Teacher,

  • Owner - Imagine Life Coaching
  • Founder - YesYOUCan Empowerment For Women Group 
  • Past President and Board Member - Holistic Chamber of Commerce Vancouver/Richmond/South Surrey
  • 4 time Amazon Author
  •  iTunes contributor 
  • YouTube Channel 
  • I began the YesYOUCan Empowerment For Women Facebook group just about a year ago, as my intention is go use the one to many model to reach as many women world wide as I possibly can so that I may empower them to live their best lives, go for their goals and manifest their dreams both in their personal and business lives.  I work with women who are in all economic brackets.  From homeless women to CEO's, many are living with low self esteem and feel disempowered, especially with recent events around women's empowerment.  My group has reached 2600 members in just over a year.  
  • My vision is huge, and my intention is to honour these donations by fulfilling these dreams to the best of my ability. 
  • While I reach women in Canada and the United States, there is so much work to be done, especially now.  Women want to continue to be heard, to be empowered and to shine like never before.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • I have put a price of 5M on my campaign and here is why.
  • I want to hire the following:
  1. My personal assistant full time instead of part time
  2. Headquarter - Office space with furnishings etc.  South Surrey
  3. Retreat Centre - optional 
  4. Hire someone to help me create my long term business plan
  5. A social media strategist 
  6. A web designer who will update my website
  7. A publicity manager
  8. An editor for a book that I have been working on for several years 
  9. Travel and accommodation expenses to help me create workshops and events to empower women 
  10. A bookkeeper
  11. A radio, tv or podcast series to interview women and empower them to step into their greatness.

I want to create the following:

Train the trainer program - Empowering women to lead YesYOUCan Events around the world

One on One Coaching for those who cannot afford my current prices but are committed to making changes in their lives.

Destination retreats for those who are ready to take their lives to the next level

Hire specialty coaches for the purpose of assisting those who need the next level:

Psychologists

Trauma counsellors

Life Coaches, Grief Coaches, Money Coaches, Empowerment Coaches and more

Create membership sites for women who want help with:

  1. Self Esteem
  2. Relationships 
  3. New Entrepreneurial ventures
  4. Inspiration 
  5. An international directory of women entrepreneurs. ( I began a project to do video interviews with women in my group so that they can share their passion for what they do with the world. With a business advisor in place, I will be able help them to monetize their business while also monetizing my own. 

 

I have chosen 2 of my favourite perks for you. 

We all need empowerment, and in this world, it becomes more and more difficult to stay connected, to be in the present moment and to go for your dreams. 

Perk 1

YesYOUCan - Be Successful is a popular model to help people everywhere to begin to think about what they truly want in life whether it's around their business or their personal lives.  

Its a 12 month series, with monthly workbooks, Guidelines and over 80 audios to help you on your way.  To take it to the next level, you might consider coaching with me.  But for now, I am very excited to offer this gift to you. 

Perk 2

YesYOUCan 365 - An Inspirational Email Series

I love inspiring people and this email series, even inspires me.  I can't wait until I open it each day to see what I sent myself.  

Each day, there is a photo that I took, somewhere in my travels, and it is accompanied by a famous quote, or a quote of my own.  I also send a short note to even further inspire.  Included in this email series is a downloadable printable page from the Calendar, and tips on how to create an empowered day. I love sharing this with people, and am grateful to be able to share it with you.  

If I don't reach my Campaign goal in dollars, I will use whatever funds I am able to raise, to do as much of the above as possible.  Reaching this goal is important to me, but if by chance I don't reach all of it, I am  still moving forward.  This work is a gift and I love it.  I would not stop just because I didn't reach a monetary goal.  

 

The Impact

This is what your financial donation will do for others:

  • What I am doing is powerful for contributors and for the world at large.  My mission for many years has been to empower women everywhere.  Now think about this for a moment.  What if women felt empowered?  When we empower another, it becomes like a domino effect.  A woman empowered, will empower her spouse, her children, her family and friends, her community and the world.  There is nothing more beautiful than that. 
  • My success track record is as follows:
  • I have worked with women all over North America and transformed many lives. 
  • I have created an amazing group of women in the YesYOUCan Empowerment For Women Group who are searching, just like millions of people, to be empowered, feel connected, and to nurture relationships in both business and their personal lives.  
  • It is my passion, my bliss and my honour to do this work, and to have so many women trust in my abilities and gifts. 

Risks & Challenges

I don't like to look at things from the perspective of obstacles and challenges. 

The risk is, that I don't reach the ones who want to transform their lives.  

There are no challenges.  You just keep going.  It's like a cha cha.  Two steps forward and one step back.   

I believe in myself, my work, and my mission.  The hurdles melt away in the face of those strengths. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute at this time, I want to thank you for visiting this campaign.  And I have a favour to ask.  Would you mind sharing?  Sharing is caring, and sometimes spreading the word, and sharing the love means more and has just as large an impact as money.  

So I just want to remind you of the sharing buttons here on the campaign page.  Please use them.  

Thank you so much for listening, and even deeper than that, for understanding at a deep level what I am asking for today.  

Many blessings, 

May you be at peace, 

May you be healthy, 

May you be happy, 

May you feel empowered, 

May you be loved. 

Caterina Barregar

Empowerment Diva

story:
Our Story

We are Kim and Lylette Russell of Crayfish Bay Organic Estate, Grenada, a small family farm which produces cocoa, and has recently started to produce a single estate, tree to bar organic chocolate.

We run our farm based on a fair share ethos whereby those who work on the farm earn 90% of the value of the wet cocoa they pick. They also have the option of planting as much yearly crops on the land as they wish, whether for selling or for personal use.

 

New Micro Chocolate Factory 

With the help of friends and many hours of hard work we have recently completed a micro chocolate factory, mostly fitted out with self made equipment and machinery created mainly from recycled materials.

Our aim is to produce a high quality organic tree to bar dark chocolate made from 75% organic cocoa solids and 25% organic sugar.

After one month of chocolate production we have come to realize that our choice of chocolate grinders was not suited to producing even small commercial quantities of chocolate. Within a four week period we began to see excessive ware and tear on most of the grinders and could only conclude that with such rapid deterioration taking place we would be unable to continue producing chocolate.

Since our project has been self funded and most of the construction done by ourselves we have exhausted our investment budget and now find that we are lacking the finance needed to purchase a grinder that is more suitable to our production needs.

We reached out to friends via our Facebook page asking for assistance and many of them showed a willingness to assist but suggested that we set up a crowd funding campaign and so here we are.

At present there is no way for us to continue producing chocolate and our micro factory will have to shut down within weeks, possibly days. This is why we are seeking assistance so that we can raise the funding to purchase a new and much more efficient chocolate grinder.

 

The Crayfish Bay Vision

With the success of our micro factory we can realize our goals of providing well paid employment for members of our village and community and producing a high quality tree to bar chocolate based on ethical farming and production processes.

 

For more information, videos and photos about Crayfish Bay please visit our Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/crayfishbaygrenada 

 

What we are asking for and what you get in return for your generosity

We need $14,000.00 to acquire a replacement grinder. This grinder is manufactured by Cocoatown of the USA.

The cost of the machine is $10,000.00, the other $4,000.00 is to cover shipping costs and customs duties. 

This grinder would replace the present small table model grinders we have been using which have proven inefficient for producing chocolate in commercial quantities.

In return for your donation you can either receive bars of chocolate or we will plant cocoa trees in your name as a reminder to us of you generosity at a time when we most needed it.

If the funds gathered do not reach the entire goal we hope to find other means of raising the balance and the entire amount will be used for purchasing the much needed grinder.

 

With Collective Effort Everyone Benefits 

The value of the project to you the contributor and to the world, is more indirect than direct. If enough people help to promote the production of organic food and fair pay for those at the bottom of the financial ladder, they are taking one tiny step in improving the quality of life for everyone and for future generations on this planet which we as a species depend upon entirely for our survival.
 

Crayfish Bay chocolate is part of a series of projects which started ten years ago with the recovery of the totally abandoned and rundown cocoa lands in a rural area of Grenada and continued with replanting and sympathetically rebuilding the derelict 19th century farm buildings.

This was all done with a great deal of help and commitment from people in the community. Many of these employees have become good friends and Crayfish Bay is bringing a light into the village which ten years ago was rated as one of the poorest in Grenada. 

Crayfish Bay cocoa and chocolate is also certified organic by CERES which allow us to demand premium price for our wet cocoa. This in effect allow those who work on the farm to earn a better living wage since they are as mentioned before paid 90% of the price of the wet cocoa.

 

Risks & Challenges

You, the donor may be asking yourselves about the risk and obstacles that we may face and how we intend to deal with these.

We see only two major risks the first is crop failure this could be due to disease or damage to the crop. Diseases and parasites in cocoa are few, and with a diligent crew, which we have, are easy to avoid with constant maintenance.  

Damage to the crop could occur from hurricane which we are insured against. The cocoa plant is amazingly resilient and within a space of about two years would be producing again. This has been proven by previous hurricanes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

To those of you reading this who have empty pockets or whose financial commitments don't allow them to donate, thank you for giving us your time by reading this. Please tell your friends and spread the word using Facebook and whatever other means including the Indiegogo share tools.

 

A short Footnote

Earlier in the year when we were experimenting with chocolate making, we had our suspicions about these grinders and whether they would be able to stand up to the demands we would be putting on them. 

A friend offered to start a Kickstarter campaign on our behalf and the following video was what he made.

We decided at the time not to start the campaign but to try and raise money through our own endeavors.

The grinders didn't last as long as we had hoped which is why we are now on Indiegogo .

We wanted to share this video so you can have a fuller understand of how we started this project and how we have developed and progressed since then.

 

Your Support is Greatly Appreciated

We would like to thank every one who assisted us in anyway. Whether it was with construction. building and designing the machines, painting, tiling, taking photographs, filming, chocolate making ideas, sharing your knowledge of chocolate making, getting the beers at the end of a very hot day, whatever it was we are extremely grateful.

Please know that your help has made a great difference to us being able to achieve this goal.
